TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpCodes extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指令的欄位表示，以用於 類別成員 (例如 ) 的發出。

span.span: Provides field representations of the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions for emission by the class members (such as ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如成員 opcode 的詳細說明，請參閱 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 文件，特別是"Partition III: CIL 指令集 」 和 「 磁碟分割 II:: 中繼資料定義和語意 >。For a detailed description of the member opcodes, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set" and "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下列範例會示範動態方法，使用的建構發出`OpCodes`到。The following example demonstrates the construction of a dynamic method using to emit `OpCodes` into a . [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.OpCodes Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Add
Public Shared ReadOnly Add As OpCode

summary.span: 相加兩個值，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Adds two values and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5858|加入add|將兩個數字的值，傳回新的數值。Adds two numeric values, returning a new numeric value.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value1`新增至`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is added to `value2`. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. 整數運算溢位都沒有偵測到 (處理適當的溢位，請參閱)。Overflow is not detected for integer operations (for proper overflow handling, see ). 整數加法包裝，而不是飽和。Integer addition wraps, rather than saturates. 比方說，假設 8 位元整數，其中`value1`設定為 255 和`value2`設為 1，已包裝的結果會是 0，而不是 256。For example, assuming 8-bit integers where `value1` is set to 255 and `value2` is set to 1, the wrapped result is 0 rather than 256. 傳回浮點溢位`+inf`(`PositiveInfinity`) 或`-inf`(`NegativeInfinity`)。Floating-point overflow returns `+inf` (`PositiveInfinity`) or `-inf` (`NegativeInfinity`). 可接受的運算元類型和其對應的結果資料類型會列在下表中。The acceptable operand types and their corresponding result data type are listed in the table below. 如果沒有任何項目，針對特定類型的組合 (例如`int32`和`float`;`int32`和`int64`)，它是無效 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL)，並產生錯誤。If there is no entry for a particular type combination (for example, `int32` and `float`; `int32` and `int64`), it is an invalid Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) and generates an error. |運算元operand|value1 類型value1 type|value2 類型value2 type|結果型別result type| |-------------|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------| |加入add|`int32`|`int32`|`int32`| |加入add|`int32`|`native int`|`native int`| |加入add|`int32`|`&`|`&`| |加入add|`int32`|`*`|`*`| |加入add|`int64`|`int64`|`int64`| |加入add|`native int`|`int32`|`native int`| |加入add|`native int`|`native int`|`native int`| |加入add|`native int`|`&`|`&`| |加入add|`native int`|`*`|`*`| |加入add|`F`|`F`|`F`| |加入add|`&`|`int32`|`&`| |加入add|`&`|`native int`|`&`| |加入add|`*`|`int32`|`*`| |加入add|`*`|`native int`|`*`| 下列方法多載可以使用`add`opcode:The following method overload can use the `add` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Add_Ovf As OpCode

summary.span: 相加兩個整數、執行溢位檢查，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Adds two integers, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D6D6|add.ovfadd.ovf|相加兩個的帶正負號的整數值，具有溢位檢查。Adds two signed integer values with an overflow check.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value1`新增至`value2`具有溢位檢查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is added to `value2` with a check for overflow. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. 如果結果未顯示的結果型別，會擲回。 is thrown if the result is not represented in the result type. 您可以執行這項作業帶正負號的整數。You can perform this operation on signed integers. 浮點數的值，使用。For floating-point values, use . 可接受的運算元類型和其對應的結果資料類型會列在下表中。The acceptable operand types and their corresponding result data type are listed in the table below. 如果沒有任何項目，針對特定類型的組合 (例如`int32`和`float`;`int32`和`int64`)，它是無效的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示並產生錯誤。If there is no entry for a particular type combination (for example, `int32` and `float`; `int32` and `int64`), it is an invalid Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction and generates an error. |運算元operand|value1 類型value1 type|value2 類型value2 type|結果型別result type| |-------------|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------| |加入add|`int32`|`int32`|`int32`| |加入add|`int32`|`native int`|`native int`| |加入add|`int32`|`&`|`&`| |加入add|`int32`|`*`|`*`| |加入add|`int64`|`int64`|`int64`| |加入add|`native int`|`int32`|`native int`| |加入add|`native int`|`native int`|`native int`| |加入add|`native int`|`&`|`&`| |加入add|`native int`|`*`|`*`| |加入add|`F`|`F`|`F`| |加入add|`&`|`int32`|`&`| |加入add|`&`|`native int`|`&`| |加入add|`*`|`int32`|`*`| |加入add|`*`|`native int`|`*`| 下列方法多載可以使用`add.ovf`opcode:The following method overload can use the `add.ovf` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 相加兩個不帶正負號的整數 (Unsigned Integer) 值、執行溢位檢查，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Adds two unsigned integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D7D7|add.ovf.unadd.ovf.un|新增兩個不帶正負號的整數值，具有溢位檢查。Adds two unsigned integer values with an overflow check.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value1`新增至`value2`具有溢位檢查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is added to `value2` with a check for overflow. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. 如果結果未顯示的結果型別，會擲回。 is thrown if the result is not represented in the result type. 您可以執行這項作業帶正負號的整數。You can perform this operation on signed integers. 浮點數的值，使用。For floating-point values, use . 可接受的運算元類型和其對應的結果資料類型會列在下表中。The acceptable operand types and their corresponding result data type are listed in the table below. 如果沒有任何項目，針對特定類型的組合 (例如`int32`和`float`;`int32`和`int64`)，它是無效的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示並產生錯誤。If there is no entry for a particular type combination (for example, `int32` and `float`; `int32` and `int64`), it is an invalid Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction and generates an error. |運算元operand|value1 類型value1 type|value2 類型value2 type|結果型別result type| |-------------|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------| |加入add|`int32`|`int32`|`int32`| |加入add|`int32`|`native int`|`native int`| |加入add|`int32`|`&`|`&`| |加入add|`int32`|`*`|`*`| |加入add|`int64`|`int64`|`int64`| |加入add|`native int`|`int32`|`native int`| |加入add|`native int`|`native int`|`native int`| |加入add|`native int`|`&`|`&`| |加入add|`native int`|`*`|`*`| |加入add|`F`|`F`|`F`| |加入add|`&`|`int32`|`&`| |加入add|`&`|`native int`|`&`| |加入add|`*`|`int32`|`*`| |加入add|`*`|`native int`|`*`| 下列方法多載可以使用`add.ovf.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `add.ovf.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly And As OpCode

summary.span: 計算兩個值的位元 AND 運算，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Computes the bitwise AND of two values and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|指令Instruction|描述Description| |------------|-----------------|-----------------| |5F5F|和and|判斷兩個整數值的位元 AND。Determines the bitwise AND of two integer values.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value1` 和`value2`從堆疊; 所推出的兩個值的位元 AND 的計算。`value1` and `value2` are popped from the stack; the bitwise AND of the two values is computed. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `and`指令會在堆疊上的前兩個值的位元 AND 的計算，並將結果留在堆疊上。The `and` instruction computes the bitwise AND of the top two values on the stack and leaves the result on the stack. `And` 是整數特定作業。`And` is an integer-specific operation. 下列方法多載可以使用`and`opcode:The following method overload can use the `and` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Arglist
Public Shared ReadOnly Arglist As OpCode

summary.span: 將 Unmanaged 指標傳回目前方法的引數清單。

span.span: Returns an unmanaged pointer to the argument list of the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 00FE 00|arglistarglist|傳回目前方法的引數清單的控制代碼。Returns an argument list handle for the current method.| 沒有評估堆疊行為都是透過這項作業。No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation. `arglist`指令傳回的不透明的控制代碼 (類型的 unmanaged 的指標`native int`)，表示目前方法的引數清單。The `arglist` instruction returns an opaque handle (an unmanaged pointer, of type `native int`) that represents the argument list of the current method. 只有在目前方法的存留期期間，這個控制代碼是有效的。This handle is valid only during the lifetime of the current method. 只要目前的方法是在控制項的執行緒上，可以不過，其他方法來傳遞控制代碼。You can, however, pass the handle to other methods as long as the current method is on the thread of control. 您只能執行`arglist`採用可變數目的引數的方法中的指示。You can only execute the `arglist` instruction within a method that takes a variable number of arguments. 下列方法多載可以使用`arglist`opcode:The following method overload can use the `arglist` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Beq
Public Shared ReadOnly Beq As OpCode

summary.span: 如果兩個值相等，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if two values are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |3B < `int32` >3B < `int32` >|beq `target`beq `target`|分支至目標指令，位移`target`兩個值是否相等。Branch to the target instruction at offset `target` if the two values are equal.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`如果從堆疊; 快顯`value1`等於`value2`，執行分支作業。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `beq`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指示如果`value1`等於`value2`。The `beq` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is equal to `value2`. 效果等同於執行`ceq`後面的指示`brtrue`分支至的特定目標指令。The effect is the same as performing a `ceq` instruction followed by a `brtrue` branch to the specific target instruction. 目標指令會表示成 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 封裝可接受的運算元類型如下：The acceptable operand types are encapsulated below: 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，以及`finally`區塊無法執行此指令 (這類傳輸有嚴格限制，而且必須使用指令改為)。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction (such transfers are severely restricted and must use the instruction instead). 下列方法多載可以使用`beq`opcode:The following method overload can use the `beq` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Beq_S
Public Shared ReadOnly Beq_S As OpCode

summary.span: 如果兩個值相等，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令 (簡短形式)。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if two values are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2E < `int8` >2E < `int8` >|後 `target`beq.s `target`|分支至目標指令，位移`target`相等，如果簡短形式Branch to the target instruction at offset `target` if equal, short form| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`如果從堆疊; 快顯`value1`等於`value2`，執行分支作業。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `beq.s`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指示如果`value1`等於`value2`。The `beq.s` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is equal to `value2`. 效果等同於執行`ceq`後面的指示`brtrue`分支至的特定目標指令。The effect is the same as performing a `ceq` instruction followed by a `brtrue` branch to the specific target instruction. 目標指令被以 1 位元帶正負號的位移，從開頭緊跟在目前的指令。The target instruction is represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 封裝可接受的運算元類型如下：The acceptable operand types are encapsulated below: 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，以及`finally`區塊無法執行此指令 (這類傳輸有嚴格限制，而且必須使用指令改為)。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction (such transfers are severely restricted and must use the instruction instead). 下列方法多載可以使用`beq.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `beq.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

summary.span: 如果第一個值大於或等於第二個值，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |3C ``3C ``|bge.s 使用 `target`bge `target`|分支至目標指令中指定的位移的第一個值是否大於或等於第二個值。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`如果從堆疊; 快顯`value1`大於或等於`value2`，執行分支作業。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `bge`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指示如果`value1`大於或等於`value2`。The `bge` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`. 效果等同於執行`clt.un`後面的指示`brfalse`分支至的特定目標指令。The effect is identical to performing a `clt.un` instruction followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 目標指令會表示成 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`bge`opcode:The following method overload can use the `bge` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Bge_S
Public Shared ReadOnly Bge_S As OpCode

summary.span: 如果第一個值大於或等於第二個值，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令 (簡短形式)。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2F ``2F ``|後 `target`bge.s `target`|分支至目標指令中指定的位移的第一個值是否大於或等於第二個值，也就是簡短形式。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value, short form.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`如果從堆疊; 快顯`value1`大於或等於`value2`，執行分支作業。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `bge.s`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指示如果`value1`大於或等於`value2`。The `bge.s` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`. 效果等同於執行`clt.un`後面的指示`brfalse`分支至的特定目標指令。The effect is identical to performing a `clt.un` instruction followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 目標指令被以 1 位元帶正負號的位移，從開頭緊跟在目前的指令。The target instruction is represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`bge.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `bge.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Bge_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Bge_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 當比較不帶正負號的整數值或未按順序的浮點值時，如果第一個值大於第二個值，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is greater than the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |41 ``41 ``|bge.un `target`bge.un `target`|分支至目標指令中指定的位移的第一個值是否大於或等於第二個值 （不帶正負號的值）。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is greater than or equal to the second value (unsigned values).| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`如果從堆疊; 快顯`value1`大於或等於`value2`，執行分支作業。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `bge.un`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指示如果`value1`大於或等於`value2`，當使用不帶正負號的整數或未排序的浮點值進行比較。The `bge.un` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is greater than or equal to `value2`, when compared using unsigned integer or unordered float values. 效果等同於執行`clt`後面的指示`brfalse`分支至的特定目標指令。The effect is identical to performing a `clt` instruction followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 目標指令會表示成 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`bge.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `bge.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) if the first value is less than or equal to the second value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |31 ``31 ``|後 `target`ble.s `target`|分支至目標指令中指定的位移的第一個值是否小於或等於第二個值，也就是簡短形式。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is less than or equal to the second value, short form.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`如果從堆疊; 快顯`value1`小於或等於`value2`，執行分支作業。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `ble.s`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指示如果`value1`小於或等於`value2`。The `ble.s` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`. 效果等同於執行`cgt`指令 (`cgt.un`的浮點數) 指令，後面跟著`brfalse`分支至的特定目標指令。The effect is identical to performing a `cgt` instruction (`cgt.un` for floats) instruction followed by a`brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 目標指令被以 1 位元帶正負號的位移，從開頭緊跟在目前的指令。The target instruction is represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`ble.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ble.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ble_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Ble_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 當比較不帶正負號的整數值或未按順序的浮點值時，如果第一個值小於或等於第二個值，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if the first value is less than or equal to the second value, when comparing unsigned integer values or unordered float values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |43 ``43 ``|ble.un `target`ble.un `target`|分支至目標指令中指定的位移的第一個值是否小於或等於第二個值 （不帶正負號的值）。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if the first value is less than or equal to the second value (unsigned values).| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`如果從堆疊; 快顯`value1`小於或等於`value2`，執行分支作業。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `ble.un`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指示如果`value1`小於或等於`value2`，當使用不帶正負號的整數或未排序的浮點值進行比較。The `ble.un` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is less than or equal to `value2`, when compared using unsigned integer or unordered float values. 效果等同於執行`cgt.un`指令 (`cgt`的浮點數) 後面接著`brfalse`分支至的特定目標指令。The effect is identical to performing a `cgt.un` instruction (`cgt` for floats) followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 目標指令會表示成 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`ble.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ble.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

summary.span: 當兩個不帶正負號的整數值或未按順序的浮點值不相等時，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令 (簡短形式)。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction (short form) when two unsigned integer values or unordered float values are not equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |33 < `int8` >33 < `int8` >|bne.un.s `target`bne.un.s `target`|分支至目標指令時所指定的位移，如果兩個不帶正負號的整數值是不相等的 （不帶正負號的值）、 簡短形式。Branch to the target instruction at the specified offset if two unsigned integer values are not equal (unsigned values), short form.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`如果從堆疊; 快顯`value1`不等於`value2`，執行分支作業。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; if `value1` is not equal to `value2`, the branch operation is performed. `bne.un`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指示如果`value1`不等於`value2`，當使用不帶正負號的整數或未排序的浮點值進行比較。The `bne.un` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value1` is not equal to `value2`, when compared using unsigned integer or unordered float values. 效果等同於執行`ceq`後面的指示`brfalse`分支至的特定目標指令。The effect is identical to performing a `ceq` instruction followed by a `brfalse` branch to the specific target instruction. 目標指令會表示成 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`bne.un.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `bne.un.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Box
Public Shared ReadOnly Box As OpCode

summary.span: 將實值型別 (Value Type) 轉換成物件參考 (型別 )。

span.span: Converts a value type to an object reference (type ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8C < `T` >8C < `T` >|方塊 `valTypeToken`box `valTypeToken`|將實值型別轉換 (在指定之型別的`valTypeToken`)，則為 true 的物件參考。Convert a value type (of the type specified in `valTypeToken`) to a true object reference.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 實值型別會推送至堆疊。A value type is pushed onto the stack. 2. 實值型別會從堆疊; 推出`box`作業。The value type is popped from the stack; the `box` operation is performed. 3. 產生的"boxed"的值類型的物件參考推送至堆疊。An object reference to the resulting "boxed" value type is pushed onto the stack. 實值型別有兩種不同的表示法在 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI):A value type has two separate representations within the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI): - 當實值型別會內嵌在另一個物件，或在堆疊上時，使用 'raw' 格式。A 'raw' form used when a value type is embedded within another object or on the stack. - 'Boxed' 格式，其中實值型別中的資料會包裝 （進行 boxed 處理） 到物件讓它可以當作獨立的實體存在。A 'boxed' form, where the data in the value type is wrapped (boxed) into an object so it can exist as an independent entity. `box`指令會將未經處理 」 (unboxed) 實值類型轉換成物件參考 (型別`O`)。The `box` instruction converts the 'raw' (unboxed) value type into an object reference (type `O`). 這被透過建立新的物件和資料複製到新配置物件的實值型別。This is accomplished by creating a new object and copying the data from the value type into the newly allocated object. `valTypeToken` 這中繼資料語彙基元，表示在堆疊上之值型別的型別。`valTypeToken` is a metadata token indicating the type of the value type on the stack. 如果沒有記憶體不足，無法滿足要求，會擲回。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. 如果找不到類別，會擲回。 is thrown if the class cannot be found. 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 轉換成機器碼，而不是在執行階段時。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) is converted to native code, rather than at runtime. 下列方法多載可以使用`box`opcode:The following method overload can use the `box` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Br
Public Shared ReadOnly Br As OpCode

summary.span: 無條件地將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

span.span: Unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |38 < `int32` >38 < `int32` >|br `target`br `target`|分支至目標指令中指定的位移。Branches to a target instruction at the specified offset.| 沒有評估堆疊行為都是透過這項作業。No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation. `br`指令無條件地將控制權傳輸至目標指令。The `br` instruction unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction. 目標指令會表示成 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`br`opcode:The following method overload can use the `br` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

span.span: Unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction (short form).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2B < `int8` >2B < `int8` >|br.s `target`br.s `target`|分支至目標指令中指定的位移，簡短形式。Branches to a target instruction at the specified offset, short form.| 沒有評估堆疊行為都是透過這項作業。No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation. `br.s`指令無條件地將控制權傳輸至目標指令。The `br.s` instruction unconditionally transfers control to a target instruction. 目標指令被以 1 位元帶正負號的位移，從開頭緊跟在目前的指令。The target instruction is represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`br.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `br.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Break
Public Shared ReadOnly Break As OpCode

summary.span: 以訊號指示 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 向偵錯工具告知已經過中斷點。

span.span: Signals the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) to inform the debugger that a break point has been tripped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0101|breakbreak|告知偵錯工具已到達中斷點。inform a debugger that a breakpoint has been reached.| 沒有評估堆疊行為都是透過這項作業。No evaluation stack behaviors are performed by this operation. `break`指示是針對偵錯支援。The `break` instruction is for debugging support. 它會通知來通知偵錯工具中斷點已跳脫 CLI。It signals the CLI to inform the debugger that a break point has been tripped. 它有沒有其他作用在解譯器的狀態。It has no other effect on the interpreter state. `break`指令具有最小可能指令的大小可讓程式碼修補設有中斷點，並產生周圍的程式碼所造成的最小影響。The `break` instruction has the smallest possible instruction size enabling code patching with a break point and generating minimal disturbance to the surrounding code. `break`指令可以捕捉到偵錯工具，不執行任何動作，或引發安全性例外狀況。The `break` instruction can trap to a debugger, do nothing, or raise a security exception. 確切的行為是由實作定義。The exact behavior is implementation-defined. 下列方法多載可以使用`break`opcode:The following method overload can use the `break` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Brfalse As OpCode

summary.span: 如果 為 、Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 ) 或零，則將控制權傳輸至目標指令。

span.span: Transfers control to a target instruction if is , a null reference ( in Visual Basic), or zero.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |39 < `int32` >39 < `int32` >|brfalse `target`brfalse `target`

brnull `target`brnull `target`

brzero `target`brzero `target`|分支至目標指令在指定的位移 if `false`。Branches to a target instruction at the specified offset if `false`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊的前一項作業。`value` is pushed onto the stack by a previous operation. 2. `value` 會從堆疊; 推出如果`value`已`false`，分支到`target`。`value` is popped from the stack; if `value` is `false`, branch to `target`. `brfalse`指令 (和其別名`brnull`並`brzero`) 將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指令，如果`value`(型別的`int32`， `int64`，物件參考`O`、 managed 指標`&`，暫時性指標`*`， `native int`) 為零 (`false`)。The `brfalse` instruction (and its aliases `brnull` and `brzero`) transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value` (of type `int32`, `int64`, object reference `O`, managed pointer `&`, transient pointer `*`, `native int`) is zero (`false`). 如果`value`為非零 (`true`) 會繼續在下一步 的指示執行。If `value` is non-zero (`true`) execution continues at the next instruction. 目標指令會表示成 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`brfalse`opcode:The following method overload can use the `brfalse` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |3A < `int32` >3A < `int32` >|brtrue `target`brtrue `target`

brinst `target`brinst `target`|如果不是零，分支至目標指令中指定的位移 (`true`)。Branch to a target instruction at the specified offset if non-zero (`true`).| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊的前一項作業。`value` is pushed onto the stack by a previous operation. 2. `value` 會從堆疊; 推出如果`value`已`true`，分支到`target`。`value` is popped from the stack; if `value` is `true`, branch to `target`. `brtrue`指令將控制權傳輸至指定的目標指示如果`value`(型別`native int`) 為非零值 (`true`)。The `brtrue` instruction transfers control to the specified target instruction if `value` (type `native int`) is nonzero (`true`). 如果`value`為零 (`false`) 會繼續在下一步 的指示執行。If `value` is zero (`false`) execution continues at the next instruction. 如果`value`是物件參考 (型別`O`) 然後`brinst`(的別名`brtrue`) 將控制權轉移，如果它代表物件的執行個體 (例如，如果不是 null 的物件參考，請參閱)。If `value` is an object reference (type `O`) then `brinst` (an alias for `brtrue`) transfers control if it represents an instance of an object (for example, if it is not the null object reference; see ). 目標指令會表示成 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從緊跟在目前指令的開頭。The target instruction is represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. 下列方法多載可以使用`brtrue`opcode:The following method overload can use the `brtrue` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

summary.span: 呼叫傳遞的方法描述項所指示的方法。

span.span: Calls the method indicated by the passed method descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |28 < `T` >28 < `T` >|呼叫 `methodDesc`call `methodDesc`|呼叫所描述方法`methodDesc`。Call the method described by `methodDesc`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`推送至堆疊。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack. 2. 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`會彈出從堆疊; 方法呼叫會使用這些引數來執行，而且控制權會轉移至方法描述元所參考的方法。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are popped from the stack; the method call is performed with these arguments and control is transferred to the method referred to by the method descriptor. 完成時，傳回的值就是被呼叫端方法所產生，並傳送至呼叫端。When complete, a return value is generated by the callee method and sent to the caller. 3. 傳回值推送至堆疊。The return value is pushed onto the stack. `call`指令呼叫傳遞指令的方法描述項所指定的方法。The `call` instruction calls the method indicated by the method descriptor passed with the instruction. 方法描述元是中繼資料語彙基元，表示要呼叫數目、 類型和放置要傳遞至該方法，以及要使用的呼叫慣例在堆疊的引數順序的方法。The method descriptor is a metadata token that indicates the method to call and the number, type, and order of the arguments that have been placed on the stack to be passed to that method as well as the calling convention to be used. `call`指令可以前面緊接`tail`() 前置詞來指定應該釋放目前的方法狀態，才能將控制權轉移的指示。The `call` instruction can be immediately preceded by a `tail` () prefix instruction to specify that the current method state should be released before transferring control. 如果呼叫會將控制權傳輸至較高的信任，比原始方法的方法，是不會釋放堆疊框架。If the call transfers control to a method of higher trust than the origin method, the stack frame is not released. 相反地，會繼續執行無訊息方式如同`tail`尚未提供。Instead, the execution continues silently as if the `tail` had not been supplied. 的中繼資料語彙基元會傳送足夠的資訊來判斷呼叫是否為靜態方法，執行個體方法，虛擬方法，或全域函式。The metadata token carries sufficient information to determine whether the call is to a static method, an instance method, a virtual method, or a global function. 在這些情況下的所有目的地位址由都決定完全從方法描述元 (與呼叫虛擬方法，其中的目的地位址也取決於執行階段類型的執行個體的指示參考推入之前)。In all of these cases the destination address is determined entirely from the method descriptor (contrast this with the instruction for calling virtual methods, where the destination address also depends upon the runtime type of the instance reference pushed before the ). 引數會放在堆疊上，在左到右的順序。The arguments are placed on the stack in left-to-right order. 也就是第一個引數會計算並放置在堆疊上，則第二個引數，則第三個，直到所有必要的引數是以遞減順序堆疊的頂端。That is, the first argument is computed and placed on the stack, then the second argument, then the third, until all necessary arguments are atop the stack in descending order. 有三個重要的特殊情況：There are three important special cases: 1. 呼叫執行個體 （或虛擬） 方法必須將推入執行個體參考之前的任何使用者可見的引數。Calls to an instance (or virtual) method must push that instance reference before any of the user-visible arguments. 執行個體的參考不能為 null 參考。The instance reference must not be a null reference. 執行中繼資料中的簽章不包含的參數清單中的項目`this`指標，而是使用位元來指出方法是否需要傳遞`this`指標。The signature carried in the metadata does not contain an entry in the parameter list for the `this` pointer; instead, it uses a bit to indicate whether the method requires passing the `this` pointer. 2. 它會有效地呼叫虛擬方法，使用`call`(而非`callvirt`); 這表示，方法是使用指定方法，而不是以動態方式從物件叫用指定的類別來解決。It is valid to call a virtual method using `call` (rather than `callvirt`); this indicates that the method is to be resolved using the class specified by method rather than as specified dynamically from the object being invoked. 3. 請注意，委派`Invoke`可以使用呼叫方法`call`或`callvirt`指令。Note that a delegate's `Invoke` method can be called with either the `call` or `callvirt` instruction. 可能會擲回，如果系統安全性不會授與被呼叫的方法的呼叫端存取。 may be thrown if system security does not grant the caller access to the called method. Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時，可能會發生安全性檢查。The security check may occur when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at run time. > [!NOTE] > 當實值型別上呼叫 System.Object 的方法，請考慮使用`constrained`加上前置詞`callvirt`而不是發出指令`call`指令。When calling methods of System.Object on value types, consider using the `constrained` prefix with the `callvirt` instruction instead of emitting a `call` instruction. 這可免除發出不同 IL 根據實值型別會覆寫方法，避免潛在的版本控制問題。This removes the need to emit different IL depending on whether or not the value type overrides the method, avoiding a potential versioning problem. 請考慮使用`constrained`可以使用變更時叫用介面方法上實值型別，因為實作介面方法的值類型方法的前置詞`MethodImpl`。Consider using the `constrained` prefix when invoking interface methods on value types, since the value type method implementing the interface method can be changed using a `MethodImpl`. 會更詳細地說明這些問題opcode。These issues are described in more detail in the opcode. 下列方法多載可以使用`call`opcode:The following method overloads can use the `call` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo) - ILGenerator.EmitCall (OpCode MethodInfo Type[])ILGenerator.EmitCall(OpCode, MethodInfo, Type[]) > [!NOTE] > 方法提供給`varargs`呼叫。The method is provided for `varargs` calls. 使用一般呼叫的方法。Use the method for normal calls.

summary.span: 以呼叫慣例所描述的引數，呼叫在評估堆疊上指示的方法 (做為進入點的指標)。

span.span: Calls the method indicated on the evaluation stack (as a pointer to an entry point) with arguments described by a calling convention.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |29 < `T` >29 < `T` >|calli `callSiteDescr`calli `callSiteDescr`|呼叫方法的呼叫慣例所描述的引數所指向。Calls the method pointed to with arguments described by the calling convention.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`推送至堆疊。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack. 2. 方法項目指標會推送至堆疊。The method entry pointer is pushed onto the stack. 3. 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`和方法的項目指標會從堆疊推出; 方法的呼叫會執行。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` and the method entry pointer are popped from the stack; the call to the method is performed. 完成時，傳回的值就是被呼叫端方法所產生，並傳送至呼叫端。When complete, a return value is generated by the callee method and sent to the caller. 4. 傳回值推送至堆疊。The return value is pushed onto the stack. `calli`指令呼叫方法的項目指標使用的引數`arg1`透過`argN`。The `calli` instruction calls the method entry pointer with the arguments `arg1` through `argN`. 這些引數類型會描述特定的呼叫慣例 (`callSiteDesc`)。The types of these arguments are described by the specific calling convention (`callSiteDesc`). `calli`指示可能前面緊接`tail`前置詞 () 來指定應該釋放目前的方法狀態，才能將控制權轉移。The `calli` instruction may be immediately preceded by a `tail` prefix () to specify that the current method state should be released before transferring control. 如果呼叫，就會傳輸將不會釋放控制項的信任層級高於原始方法的堆疊框架的方法;相反地，執行會以無訊息模式繼續如同`tail`尚未提供。If the call would transfer control to a method of higher trust than the origin method the stack frame will not be released; instead, the execution will continue silently as if the `tail` had not been supplied. 方法的項目指標會假設為原生程式碼 （的目標電腦） 可以合法地呼叫 （獨立的簽章的中繼資料語彙基元） 的呼叫慣例所描述的引數的特定指標。The method entry pointer is assumed to be a specific pointer to native code (of the target machine) that can be legitimately called with the arguments described by the calling convention (a metadata token for a stand-alone signature). 您可以使用建立這類指標或的指示，或傳入的原生程式碼。Such a pointer can be created using the or instructions, or passed in from native code. 呼叫慣例不會以動態方式檢查，因此程式碼該使用`calli`指令無法正常運作如果目的地不會實際使用指定的呼叫慣例。The calling convention is not checked dynamically, so code that uses a `calli` instruction does not work correctly if the destination does not actually use the specified calling convention. 引數會放在堆疊上，在左到右的順序。The arguments are placed on the stack in left-to-right order. 也就是第一個引數會計算並放置在堆疊上，則第二個引數，則第三個，直到所有必要的引數是以遞減順序堆疊的頂端。That is, the first argument is computed and placed on the stack, then the second argument, then the third, until all necessary arguments are atop the stack in descending order. 執行個體或虛擬方法的引數建置程式碼順序必須將該執行個體參考 （不得為 null 參考） 之前的任何使用者可見的引數推入。The argument-building code sequence for an instance or virtual method must push that instance reference (which must not be a null reference) before any of the user-visible arguments. 可能會擲回，如果系統安全性不會授與被呼叫的方法的呼叫端存取。 may be thrown if the system security does not grant the caller access to the called method. Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時，可以發生安全性檢查。The security check can occur when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at runtime. 下列方法可用來執行`calli`堆疊上的指示。The following methods can be used to perform a `calli` instruction on the stack. 請注意，`calli`應該透過呼叫以下方法，而不是使用類別將直接在堆疊上的指示。Note that `calli` should be called through the below methods rather than using the class to place the instruction directly on the stack. - ILGenerator.EmitCalli (Opcode、 CallingConventions、 型別，Type []，Type[]) 呼叫使用的 managed 呼叫慣例。ILGenerator.EmitCalli(Opcode, CallingConventions, Type, Type[], Type[]) for calls using a managed calling convention. - ILGenerator.EmitCalli (Opcode CallingConvention，型別，Type[]) 呼叫使用的 unmanaged 呼叫慣例。ILGenerator.EmitCalli(Opcode, CallingConvention, Type, Type[]) for calls using an unmanaged calling convention.

Public Shared ReadOnly Callvirt As OpCode

summary.span: 在物件上呼叫晚期繫結方法，將傳回值推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Calls a late-bound method on an object, pushing the return value onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6F < `T` >6F < `T` >|callvirt `method`callvirt `method`|呼叫相關聯的特定方法`obj`。Calls a specific method associated with `obj`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考`obj`推送至堆疊。An object reference `obj` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`推送至堆疊。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack. 3. 方法引數`arg1`透過`argN`和物件參考`obj`會彈出從堆疊; 方法呼叫會使用這些引數來執行，而且控制權會轉移至中的方法`obj`指方法中繼資料語彙基元。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` and the object reference `obj` are popped from the stack; the method call is performed with these arguments and control is transferred to the method in `obj` referred to by the method metadata token. 完成時，傳回的值就是被呼叫端方法所產生，並傳送至呼叫端。When complete, a return value is generated by the callee method and sent to the caller. 4. 傳回值推送至堆疊。The return value is pushed onto the stack. `callvirt`指令的物件上呼叫晚期繫結方法。The `callvirt` instruction calls a late-bound method on an object. 也就是說，方法選擇根據執行階段類型的`obj`而不是編譯時期類別顯示在方法的指標。That is, the method is chosen based on the runtime type of `obj` rather than the compile-time class visible in the method pointer. `Callvirt` 可用來呼叫虛擬和執行個體方法。`Callvirt` can be used to call both virtual and instance methods. `callvirt`指示可能前面緊接`tail`() 前置詞，以指定應該釋放目前的堆疊框架，才能將控制權轉移。The `callvirt` instruction may be immediately preceded by a `tail` () prefix to specify that the current stack frame should be released before transferring control. 如果呼叫，就會傳輸不會釋放控制項的信任層級高於原始方法的堆疊框架的方法。If the call would transfer control to a method of higher trust than the original method the stack frame will not be released. 方法的中繼資料語彙基元提供名稱、 類別和要呼叫之方法的簽章。The method metadata token provides the name, class and signature of the method to call. 與相關聯的類別`obj`是它的執行個體的類別。The class associated with `obj` is the class of which it is an instance. 如果類別定義了符合指定的方法名稱和簽章的非靜態方法，會呼叫這個方法。If the class defines a non-static method that matches the indicated method name and signature, this method is called. 否則順序會檢查此類別的基底類別鏈結中的所有類別。Otherwise all classes in the base class chain of this class are checked in order. 如果找不到任何方法，它就會是錯誤。It is an error if no method is found. `Callvirt` 在呼叫方法之前出現的物件和相關聯的引數，從評估堆疊。`Callvirt` pops the object and the associated arguments off the evaluation stack before calling the method. 如果方法具有傳回值，則會將它推入方法完成時的堆疊。If the method has a return value, it is pushed on the stack upon method completion. 被呼叫端一端`obj`參數會當做引數為 0，`arg1`做為引數 1，依此類推。On the callee side, the `obj` parameter is accessed as argument 0, `arg1` as argument 1, and so on. 引數會放在堆疊上，在左到右的順序。The arguments are placed on the stack in left-to-right order. 也就是第一個引數會計算並放置在堆疊上，則第二個引數，則第三個，直到所有必要的引數是以遞減順序堆疊的頂端。That is, the first argument is computed and placed on the stack, then the second argument, then the third, until all necessary arguments are atop the stack in descending order. 執行個體參考`obj`(一律所需的`callvirt`) 必須推送之前的任何使用者可見的引數。The instance reference `obj` (always required for `callvirt`) must be pushed before any of the user-visible arguments. （包含在中繼資料語彙基元） 的簽章不需要這個包含的參數清單中的項目指標。The signature (carried in the metadata token) need not contain an entry in the parameter list for the this pointer. 請注意，虛擬方法也可以呼叫使用指令。Note that a virtual method can also be called using the instruction. 如果相關聯的類別中找不到具有指定的名稱和簽章的非靜態方法會擲回`obj`或任何其基底類別。 is thrown if a non-static method with the indicated name and signature could not be found in the class associated with `obj` or any of its base classes. 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime. 如果 obj 為 null，會擲回。 is thrown if obj is null. 如果系統安全性不會授與被呼叫的方法的呼叫端存取，會擲回。 is thrown if system security does not grant the caller access to the called method. CIL 轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時，可能會發生安全性檢查。The security check may occur when the CIL is converted to native code rather than at run time. > [!NOTE] > 當實值型別上呼叫 System.Object 的方法，請考慮使用`constrained`加上前置詞`callvirt`指令。When calling methods of System.Object on value types, consider using the `constrained` prefix with the `callvirt` instruction. 這可免除發出不同 IL 根據實值型別會覆寫方法，避免潛在的版本控制問題。This removes the need to emit different IL depending on whether or not the value type overrides the method, avoiding a potential versioning problem. 請考慮使用`constrained`可以使用變更時叫用介面方法上實值型別，因為實作介面方法的值類型方法的前置詞`MethodImpl`。Consider using the `constrained` prefix when invoking interface methods on value types, since the value type method implementing the interface method can be changed using a `MethodImpl`. 會更詳細地說明這些問題opcode。These issues are described in more detail in the opcode. 下列方法多載可以使用`callvirt`opcode:The following method overload can use the `callvirt` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo) - ILGenerator.EmitCall (OpCode MethodInfo Type[])ILGenerator.EmitCall(OpCode, MethodInfo, Type[])

summary.span: 嘗試將參考所傳遞的物件轉型為指定的類別。

span.span: Attempts to cast an object passed by reference to the specified class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |74 < `T` >74 < `T` >|castclass `class`castclass `class`|將轉換至新的物件型別的物件`class`。Casts an object to a new object of type `class`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考推送至堆疊。An object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 物件參考是從堆疊; 推出參考的物件轉換為指定`class`。The object reference is popped from the stack; the referenced object is cast as the specified `class`. 3. 如果成功，則會將新的物件參考推送至堆疊。If successful, a new object reference is pushed onto the stack. `castclass`指令會嘗試轉換的物件參考 (型別`O`) 指定的類別到堆疊的頂端。The `castclass` instruction attempts to cast the object reference (type `O`) atop the stack to a specified class. 新的類別被指定的中繼資料語彙基元，指出所需的類別。The new class is specified by a metadata token indicating the desired class. 如果堆疊頂端的物件類別不會實作新的類別 （假設新的類別介面），而不是在衍生的類別的新類別則就會擲回。If the class of the object on the top of the stack does not implement the new class (assuming the new class is an interface) and is not a derived class of the new class then an is thrown. 如果物件參考為 null 參考，`castclass`成功並傳回新的物件為 null 參考。If the object reference is a null reference, `castclass` succeeds and returns the new object as a null reference. 如果 obj 無法轉換成類別，會擲回。 is thrown if obj cannot be cast to class. 如果找不到類別，會擲回。 is thrown if class cannot be found. 這通常是偵測到的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。This is typically detected when a Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code rather than at runtime. 下列方法多載可以使用`castclass`opcode:The following method overload can use the `castclass` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

Public Shared ReadOnly Ceq As OpCode

summary.span: 比較兩個值。

span.span: Compares two values.

summary.span: 如果相等，則將整數值 1 () 推入至評估堆疊，否則將 0 () 推入至評估堆疊。

span.span: If they are equal, the integer value 1 ) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 () is pushed onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 01FE 01|ceqceq|推送 1，如果`value1`等於`value2`，否則將 0 推入。Pushes 1 if `value1` equals `value2`; else pushes 0.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value1`相較於`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is compared to `value2`. 4. 如果`value1`等於`value2`，1 會推送至堆疊，否則為 0 會推入至堆疊。If `value1` is equal to `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack. `ceq`指示比較`value1`和`value2`。The `ceq` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`. 如果`value1`等於`value2`，然後 1 (型別`int32`) 推送到堆疊上。If `value1` is equal to `value2`, then 1 (of type `int32`) is pushed on the stack. 否則為 0 (型別`int32`) 推送到堆疊上。Otherwise 0 (of type `int32`) is pushed on the stack. 浮點數的`ceq`會傳回 0，如果數字排序 （或兩者皆是 NaN）。For floating-point number, `ceq` will return 0 if the numbers are unordered (either or both are NaN). 對其本身的無限值相等。The infinite values are equal to themselves. 下列方法多載可以使用`ceq`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ceq` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 比較兩個值。

span.span: Compares two values.

summary.span: 如果第一個值大於第二個值，則將整數值 1 () 推入至評估堆疊，否則，將 0 () 推入至評估堆疊。

span.span: If the first value is greater than the second, the integer value 1 ) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 () is pushed onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 02FE 02|cgtcgt|推送 1，如果`value1`大於`value2`，否則將 0 推入。Pushes 1 if `value1` is greater than `value2`; else pushes 0.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`cgt`測試`value1`大於`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `cgt` tests if `value1` is greater than `value2`. 4. 如果`value1`大於`value2`，1 會推送至堆疊，否則為 0 會推入至堆疊。If `value1` is greater than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack. `cgt`指示比較`value1`和`value2`。The `cgt` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`. 如果`value1`必定大於`value2`，然後`int32`值 1 會推送到堆疊上。If `value1` is strictly greater than `value2`, then an `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack. 否則， `int32` 0 值推送到堆疊上。Otherwise, an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack. - 浮點數，`cgt`會傳回 0，如果數字排序 （亦即，如果一或兩個引數是 NaN）。For floating-point numbers, `cgt` returns 0 if the numbers are unordered (that is, if one or both of the arguments are NaN). 下列方法多載可以使用`cgt`opcode:The following method overload can use the `cgt` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 如果第一個值大於第二個值，則將整數值 1 () 推入至評估堆疊，否則，將 0 () 推入至評估堆疊。

span.span: If the first value is greater than the second, the integer value 1 ) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 () is pushed onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 03FE 03|cgt.uncgt.un|推送 1，如果`value1`大於`value2`，否則將 0 （不帶正負號的值） 推入。Pushes 1 if `value1` is greater than `value2`; else pushes 0 (unsigned values).| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`cgt.un`測試`value1`大於`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `cgt.un` tests if `value1` is greater than `value2`. 4. 如果`value1`大於`value2`，1 會推送至堆疊，否則為 0 會推入至堆疊。If `value1` is greater than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack. `int32`值為 1 會推送到堆疊上，如果下列任一項為`true`:An `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack if any of the following is `true` : 浮點數，如`value1`相對於未經過排序`value2`。For floating-point numbers, `value1` is not ordered with respect to `value2`. 對於整數值`value1`必定大於`value2`時視為不帶正負號的數字。For integer values, `value1` is strictly greater than `value2` when considered as unsigned numbers. 否則`int32`0 值推送到堆疊上。Otherwise an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack. 下列方法多載可以使用`cgt.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `cgt.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Ckfinite As OpCode

summary.span: 如果值非有限數值，則擲回 。

span.span: Throws if value is not a finite number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |C3C3|ckfiniteckfinite|擲回如果值不是有限的數量。throw if value is not a finite number.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊...`value` is pushed onto the stack.. 2. `value` 會從堆疊推出和`ckfinite`指令會在其上執行。`value` is popped from the stack and the `ckfinite` instruction is performed on it. 3. `value` 推送回至堆疊在擲回任何例外狀況。`value` is pushed back onto the stack if no exception is thrown. `ckfinite instruction`會擲回如果`value`（浮點數） 是 「 不是數字 」 值 (NaN) 或`+-`無限大值。The `ckfinite instruction` throws if `value` (a floating-point number) is either a "not a number" value (NaN) or a `+-` infinity value. `Ckfinite` 如果擲不回任何例外狀況，請將值保留在堆疊上。`Ckfinite` leaves the value on the stack if no exception is thrown. 如果未指定執行，是`value`不是浮點數的數字。Execution is unspecified if `value` is not a floating-point number. 如果擲回`value`不是 'normal' 的數字。 is thrown if `value` is not a 'normal' number. 請注意，特殊的例外狀況或衍生的類別的可能更合適，將不正確的值傳遞至例外狀況處理常式。Note that a special exception or a derived class of may be more appropriate, passing the incorrect value to the exception handler. 下列方法多載可以使用`ckfinite`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ckfinite` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 如果第一個值小於第二個值，則將整數值 1 () 推入至評估堆疊，否則，將 0 () 推入至評估堆疊。

span.span: If the first value is less than the second, the integer value 1 ) is pushed onto the evaluation stack; otherwise 0 () is pushed onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 04FE 04|cltclt|推送 1，如果`value1`是小於`value2`，否則將 0 推入。Pushes 1 if `value1` is less than `value2`; else pushes 0.| Stack 轉換行為的循序順序是：`value1`推送至堆疊。The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: `value1` is pushed onto the stack. 1. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`clt`測試`value1`是小於`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `clt` tests if `value1` is less than `value2`. 3. 如果`value1`是小於`value2`，1 會推送至堆疊，否則為 0 會推入至堆疊。If `value1` is less than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack. `clt`指示比較`value1`和`value2`。The `clt` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`. 如果`value1`是小於`value2`，然後`int32`值 1 會推送到堆疊上。If `value1` is strictly less than `value2`, then an `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack. 否則， `int32` 0 值推送到堆疊上。Otherwise, an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack. - 浮點數，`clt`會傳回 0，如果數字排序 （亦即，如果一或兩個引數是 NaN）。For floating-point numbers, `clt` returns 0 if the numbers are unordered (that is, if one or both of the arguments are NaN). 下列方法多載可以使用`clt`opcode:The following method overload can use the `clt` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 05FE 05|clt.unclt.un|推送 1，如果`value1`是小於`value2`，否則將 0 （不帶正負號的值） 推入。Pushes 1 if `value1` is less than `value2`; else pushes 0 (unsigned values).| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`clt.un`測試`value1`是小於`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `clt.un` tests if `value1` is less than `value2`. 4. 如果`value1`是小於`value2`，1 會推送至堆疊，否則為 0 會推入至堆疊。If `value1` is less than `value2`, 1 is pushed onto the stack; otherwise 0 is pushed onto the stack. `clt.un`指示比較`value1`和`value2`。The `clt.un` instruction compares `value1` and `value2`. `int32`值 1 會推送到堆疊上，如果下列任一項為真：An `int32` value of 1 is pushed on the stack if any of the following is true: - `value1` 是小於`value2`(與`clt`)。`value1` is strictly less than `value2` (as for `clt`). - 浮點數，如`value1`相對於未經過排序`value2`。For floating-point numbers, `value1` is not ordered with respect to `value2`. - 對於整數值`value1`是小於`value2`時視為不帶正負號的數字。For integer values, `value1` is strictly less than `value2` when considered as unsigned numbers. 否則， `int32` 0 值推送到堆疊上。Otherwise, an `int32` value of 0 is pushed on the stack. 下列方法多載可以使用`clt.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `clt.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Constrained
Public Shared ReadOnly Constrained As OpCode

summary.span: 限制其上可進行虛擬方法呼叫的類型。

span.span: Constrains the type on which a virtual method call is made.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 16 < `T` >FE 16 < `T` >|限制。constrained. `thisType`|呼叫虛擬方法的型別上限制為型別`T`。Call a virtual method on a type constrained to be type `T`.| `constrained`前置詞僅允許`callvirt`指令。The `constrained` prefix is permitted only on a `callvirt` instruction. MSIL 堆疊目前的狀態必須如下所示：The state of the MSIL stack at this point must be as follows: 1. 受管理的指標， `ptr`，推送到堆疊。A managed pointer, `ptr`, is pushed onto the stack. 型別`ptr`必須是 managed 的指標 (`&`) 以`thisType`。The type of `ptr` must be a managed pointer (`&`) to `thisType`. 請注意，這是從無前置詞的大小寫不同`callvirt`指令，這需要的參考`thisType`。Note that this is different from the case of an unprefixed `callvirt` instruction, which expects a reference of `thisType`. 2. 方法引數`arg1`經由`argN`推送到堆疊上，就如同無前置詞`callvirt`指令。Method arguments `arg1` through `argN` are pushed onto the stack, just as with an unprefixed `callvirt` instruction. `constrained`前置詞設計成允許`callvirt`指示，設定成以統一方式獨立是否`thisType`是實值類型或參考型別。The `constrained` prefix is designed to allow `callvirt` instructions to be made in a uniform way independent of whether `thisType` is a value type or a reference type. 當`callvirt``method`指示加`constrained` `thisType`，指示執行，如下所示：When a `callvirt` `method` instruction has been prefixed by `constrained` `thisType`, the instruction is executed as follows: - 如果`thisType`是參考型別 （而不是實值型別），則`ptr`已取值，而且傳遞 'this' 指標`callvirt`的`method`。If `thisType` is a reference type (as opposed to a value type) then `ptr` is dereferenced and passed as the 'this' pointer to the `callvirt` of `method`. - 如果`thisType`是實值類型和`thisType`實作`method`然後`ptr`傳遞未修改為 'this' 指標`call``method`實作的指示，`method`由`thisType`.If `thisType` is a value type and `thisType` implements `method` then `ptr` is passed unmodified as the 'this' pointer to a `call` `method` instruction, for the implementation of `method` by `thisType`. - 如果`thisType`是實值類型和`thisType`不會實作`method`然後`ptr`取值、 boxed，和以 'this' 指標傳遞`callvirt``method`指令。If `thisType` is a value type and `thisType` does not implement `method` then `ptr` is dereferenced, boxed, and passed as the 'this' pointer to the `callvirt` `method` instruction. 最後這個情況下可能會發生時，才`method`上已定義， ，或並沒有覆寫`thisType`。This last case can occur only when `method` was defined on , , or and not overridden by `thisType`. 在此情況下，boxing 會導致設為原始物件的複本。In this case, the boxing causes a copy of the original object to be made. 不過，因為沒有任何方法， ，和修改狀態的物件，無法偵測到這項事實。However, because none of the methods of , , and modify the state of the object, this fact cannot be detected. `constrained`前置詞支援建立泛型的程式碼的 IL 產生器。The `constrained` prefix supports IL generators that create generic code. 通常`callvirt`指令無效，無法在實值型別。Normally the `callvirt` instruction is not valid on value types. 而是需要 IL 編譯器會有效地執行上面所述，在編譯時期，視類型而定的 'this' 的轉換`ptr`和被呼叫的方法。Instead it is required that IL compilers effectively perform the 'this' transformation outlined above at compile time, depending on the type of `ptr` and the method being called. 不過，當`ptr`是在編譯時期不知道泛型型別不可能進行這項轉換，在編譯時期。However, when `ptr` is a generic type that is unknown at compile time, it is not possible to make this transformation at compile time. `constrained` Opcode 允許 IL 編譯器來進行統一的虛擬函式呼叫是否方式獨立`ptr`是實值類型或參考型別。The `constrained` opcode allows IL compilers to make a call to a virtual function in a uniform way independent of whether `ptr` is a value type or a reference type. 雖然它適用於案例所在`thisType`是泛型型別變數，`constrained`前置詞也適用於非泛型型別，並且可以減少產生隱藏實值型別之間的差異的語言中的虛擬呼叫的複雜性和參考型別。Although it is intended for the case where `thisType` is a generic type variable, the `constrained` prefix also works for nongeneric types and can reduce the complexity of generating virtual calls in languages that hide the distinction between value types and reference types. 使用`constrained`前置詞也可避免潛在的實值類型的版本控制問題。Using the `constrained` prefix also avoids potential versioning problems with value types. 如果`constrained`不使用前置詞，根據實值型別是否會覆寫 System.Object 的方法必須發出不同的 IL。If the `constrained` prefix is not used, different IL must be emitted depending on whether or not a value type overrides a method of System.Object. 比方說，如果實值型別`V`object.tostring （） 方法，就會覆寫`call``V.ToString()`指令，就會發出; 如果沒有出現，請`box`指令並`callvirt``Object.ToString()`發出指令。For example, if a value type `V` overrides the Object.ToString() method, a `call` `V.ToString()` instruction is emitted; if it does not, a `box` instruction and a `callvirt` `Object.ToString()` instruction are emitted. 版本控制問題可能發生在先前的情況下，如果稍後移除覆寫，並在後者的情況下，如果稍後新增覆寫。A versioning problem can arise in the former case if the override is later removed, and in the latter case if an override is later added. `constrained`前置詞可以也實值類型上的介面方法引動過程使用，因為實作介面方法的值型別方法可以使用變更`MethodImpl`。The `constrained` prefix can also be used for invocation of interface methods on value types, because the value type method implementing the interface method can be changed using a `MethodImpl`. 如果`constrained`不使用前置詞，編譯器會強迫選擇其中一個值在編譯時期繫結至類型的方法。If the `constrained` prefix is not used, the compiler is forced to choose which of the value type's methods to bind to at compile time. 使用`constrained`前置詞可讓繫結至的方法，在執行階段，而不是在編譯時期，會實作介面方法的 MSIL。Using the `constrained` prefix allows the MSIL to bind to the method that implements the interface method at run time, rather than at compile time. 下列方法多載可以使用`constrained`opcode:The following method overload can use the `constrained` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Conv_I
Public Shared ReadOnly Conv_I As OpCode

summary.span: 將評估堆疊頂端的值轉換成 。

span.span: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D3D3|conv.iconv.i|將轉換成`native int`推送、`native int`堆疊上。Convert to `native int`, pushing `native int` on stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.i` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的保留在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.i` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或是`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 從浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 從轉換時`float64`至`float32`，有效位數可能會遺失。When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`是正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`是負數) 會傳回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 如果轉換的一個整數型別到另一個發生溢位，會截斷高序位位元。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是 sign-extended 以填滿的位置。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 如果發生溢位而將浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified. 使用此欄位時，以往會擲不回任何例外狀況。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 請參閱和的對應時的結果型別可以正確地代表結果值將會擲回例外狀況的指示。See and for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.i`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
