span.span: Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to signed and extends it to , throwing on overflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |B3B3|conv.ovf.i1conv.ovf.i1|將轉換成`int8`(在堆疊上`int32`) 並在溢位上擲回的例外狀況。Convert to an `int8` (on the stack as `int32`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.i1` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.ovf.i1` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值太大或太小，表示目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或是`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.ovf.i1`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.i1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Conv_Ovf_I1_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 將評估堆疊頂端不帶正負號的值轉換成帶正負號的 ，將它擴充到 ，並在溢位上擲回 。

span.span: Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to signed and extends it to , throwing on overflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8282|conv.ovf.i1.unconv.ovf.i1.un|將不帶正負號的值轉換`int8`(在堆疊上`int32`) 並在溢位上擲回的例外狀況。Converts an unsigned value to an `int8` (on the stack as `int32`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.i1.un` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.ovf.i1.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值太大或太小，表示目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或是`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.ovf.i1.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.i1.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Converts the signed value on top of the evaluation stack to , throwing on overflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D5D5|conv.ovf.uconv.ovf.u|將轉換成`unsigned native int`(在堆疊上`native int`) 並在溢位上擲回的例外狀況。Convert to an `unsigned native int` (on the stack as `native int`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.u` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.ovf.u` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值太大或太小，表示目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或是`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.ovf.u`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.u` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Conv_Ovf_U_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Conv_Ovf_U_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 將評估堆疊頂端不帶正負號的值轉換成 ，並在溢位上擲回 。

span.span: Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to , throwing on overflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8B8B|conv.ovf.u.unconv.ovf.u.un|將取消不帶正負號值`unsigned native int`(在堆疊上`native int`) 並在溢位上擲回的例外狀況。Converts un unsigned value to an `unsigned native int` (on the stack as `native int`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.u.un` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.ovf.u.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值太大或太小，表示目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或是`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.uvf.u.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.uvf.u.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |BABA|conv.ovf.u8conv.ovf.u8|將轉換成`unsigned int64`(在堆疊上`int64`) 並在溢位上擲回的例外狀況。Convert to an `unsigned int64` (on the stack as `int64`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.u8` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.ovf.u8` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值太大或太小，表示目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或是`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.ovf.u8`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.u8` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Converts the unsigned value on top of the evaluation stack to , throwing on overflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8989|conv.ovf.u8.unconv.ovf.u8.un|將不帶正負號的值轉換`unsigned int64`(在堆疊上`int64`) 並在溢位上擲回的例外狀況。Converts an unsigned value to an `unsigned int64` (on the stack as `int64`) and throw an exception on overflow.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 如果發生溢位，則會擲回例外狀況。If overflow occurs, an exception is thrown. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.ovf.u8.un` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的位置中指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.ovf.u8.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and places that converted value on the top of the stack. 如果值太大或太小，表示目標類型，則會擲回例外狀況。If the value is too large or too small to be represented by the target type, an exception is thrown. 浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversions from floating-point numbers to integer values truncate the number toward zero. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.ovf.i`或是`conv.ovf.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.ovf.i` or `conv.ovf.u` are used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.ovf.u8.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.ovf.u8.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 將評估堆疊頂端不帶正負號的整數 (Unsigned Integer) 值轉換成 。

span.span: Converts the unsigned integer value on top of the evaluation stack to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7676|conv.r.unconv.r.un|Convert 不帶正負號的整數到浮點數，推送`F`堆疊上。Convert unsigned integer to floating-point, pushing `F` on stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.r.un` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的保留在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.r.un` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或是`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 從浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 從轉換時`float64`至`float32`，有效位數可能會遺失。When converting from a `float64` to a `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`是正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`是負數) 會傳回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 如果轉換的一個整數型別到另一個發生溢位，會截斷高序位位元。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是 sign-extended 以填滿的位置。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 如果發生溢位浮點類型轉換成整數`result`傳回未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the `result` returned is unspecified. `conv.r.un`作業會接受整數堆疊、 將它解譯為不帶正負號，並取代浮點數，表示整數： 任一`float32`，如果這是寬度不足以代表整數而不會遺失有效位數，或其他`float64`。The `conv.r.un` operation takes an integer off the stack, interprets it as unsigned, and replaces it with a floating-point number to represent the integer: either a `float32`, if this is wide enough to represent the integer without loss of precision, or else a `float64`. 使用此欄位時，以往會擲不回任何例外狀況。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.r.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.r.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Conv_R4
Public Shared ReadOnly Conv_R4 As OpCode

summary.span: 將評估堆疊頂端的值轉換成 。

span.span: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6B6B|conv.r4conv.r4|將轉換成`float32`推送、`F`堆疊上。Convert to `float32`, pushing `F` on stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.r4` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的保留在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.r4` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或是`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 從浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 從轉換時`float64`至`float32`，有效位數可能會遺失。When converting from an `float64` to an `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`是正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`是負數) 會傳回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 如果轉換的一個整數型別到另一個發生溢位，會截斷高序位位元。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是 sign-extended 以填滿的位置。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 如果發生溢位而將浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified. 使用此欄位時，以往會擲不回任何例外狀況。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.r4`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.r4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 將評估堆疊頂端的值轉換成 ，並將它擴充到 。

span.span: Converts the value on top of the evaluation stack to , and extends it to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D1D1|conv.u2conv.u2|將轉換成`int16`推送、`int32`堆疊上。Convert to `int16`, pushing `int32` on stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.u2` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的保留在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.u2` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或是`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 從浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 從轉換時`float64`至`float32`，有效位數可能會遺失。When converting from an `float64` to an `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`是正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`是負數) 會傳回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 如果轉換的一個整數型別到另一個發生溢位，會截斷高序位位元。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是 sign-extended 以填滿的位置。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 如果發生溢位而將浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified. 使用此欄位時，以往會擲不回任何例外狀況。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 請參閱和的對應時的結果型別可以正確地代表結果值將會擲回例外狀況的指示。See and for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.u2`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.u2` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6D6D|conv.u4conv.u4|將轉換成`unsigned int32`推送、`int32`堆疊上。Convert to `unsigned int32`, pushing `int32` on stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 時會推出堆疊，並轉換從嘗試作業。`value` is popped from the stack and the conversion operation is attempted. 3. 如果轉換成功，則會將產生的值推送至堆疊。If the conversion is successful, the resulting value is pushed onto the stack. `conv.u4` Opcode 轉換`value`opcode 及轉換的堆疊頂端值的保留在指定的型別堆疊的頂端。The `conv.u4` opcode converts the `value` on top of the stack to the type specified in the opcode, and leave that converted value on the top of the stack. 少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`時載入至評估堆疊 (除非`conv.i`或是`conv.u`使用時，結果在此情況下也是`native int`)。Integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack (unless `conv.i` or `conv.u` is used, in which case the result is also `native int`). 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`型別。Floating-point values are converted to the `F` type. 從浮點數轉換成整數值會截斷趨近於零的數字。Conversion from floating-point numbers to integer values truncates the number toward zero. 從轉換時`float64`至`float32`，有效位數可能會遺失。When converting from an `float64` to an `float32`, precision can be lost. 如果`value`太大，以致於無法納入`float32 (F)`，正無限大 (如果`value`是正值) 或負的無限值 (如果`value`是負數) 會傳回。If `value` is too large to fit in a `float32 (F)`, positive infinity (if `value` is positive) or negative infinity (if `value` is negative) is returned. 如果轉換的一個整數型別到另一個發生溢位，會截斷高序位位元。If overflow occurs converting one integer type to another, the high order bits are truncated. 如果結果為小於`int32`，值是 sign-extended 以填滿的位置。If the result is smaller than an `int32`, the value is sign-extended to fill the slot. 如果發生溢位而將浮點類型轉換成整數傳回的值未指定。If overflow occurs converting a floating-point type to an integer the value returned is unspecified. 使用此欄位時，以往會擲不回任何例外狀況。No exceptions are ever thrown when using this field. 請參閱和的對應時的結果型別可以正確地代表結果值將會擲回例外狀況的指示。See and for equivalent instructions that will throw an exception when the result type can not properly represent the result value. 下列方法多載可以使用`conv.u4`opcode:The following method overload can use the `conv.u4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Cpblk
Public Shared ReadOnly Cpblk As OpCode

summary.span: 將指定的數值位元組數從來源位址複製到目的位址。

span.span: Copies a specified number bytes from a source address to a destination address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 17FE 17|cpblkcpblk|將資料從一個記憶體區塊複製到另一個。Copy data from one memory block to another.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 目的地位址被推送至堆疊。The destination address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 來源地址推送至堆疊。The source address is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要複製的位元組數目會推送至堆疊。The number of bytes to copy is pushed onto the stack. 4. 從堆疊; 所推出的位元組、 來源位址和目的地位址數目指定的位元組數目會從來源位址複製，其目的位址。The number of bytes, the source address, and the destination address are popped from the stack; the specified number of bytes are copied from the source address to the destination address. `cpblk`指令會將複製的數字 (型別`unsigned int32`) 的位元組從來源位址 (型別的`*`， `native int`，或`&`) 到目的地位址 (型別的`*`， `native int`，或`&`)。The `cpblk` instruction copies a number (type `unsigned int32`) of bytes from a source address (of type `*`, `native int`, or `&`) to a destination address (of type `*`, `native int`, or `&`). 行為`cpblk`是未指定，如果來源和目的地區域重疊。The behavior of `cpblk` is unspecified if the source and destination areas overlap. `cpblk` 假設來源和目的位址對齊自然機器的大小。`cpblk` assumes that both the source and destination addressed are aligned to the natural size of the machine. `cpblk`指令可以前面緊接`unaligned.`表示未對齊的來源或目的地的指示。The `cpblk` instruction can be immediately preceded by the `unaligned.` instruction to indicate that either the source or the destination is unaligned. 營運`cpblk`可以改變指示錯誤的前或前置詞指令。The operation of the `cpblk` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 可能會擲回，如果偵測到無效的位址。 may be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 下列方法多載可以使用`cpblk`opcode:The following method overload can use the `cpblk` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Cpobj
Public Shared ReadOnly Cpobj As OpCode

summary.span: 將位於物件位址上的實值型別 (型別 、 或 ) 複製到目的物件的位址 (型別 、 或 )。

span.span: Copies the value type located at the address of an object (type , or ) to the address of the destination object (type , or ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |70 < `T` >70 < `T` >|cpobj `classTok`cpobj `classTok`|目的地物件，從來源物件類型值的複本。Copies a value type from a source object to a destination object.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 目的地物件參考推送至堆疊。The destination object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 來源物件參考推送至堆疊。The source object reference is pushed onto the stack. 3. 從堆疊; 所推出的兩個物件參考實值型別在位址的來源物件會複製到目的地物件的位址。The two object references are popped from the stack; the value type at the address of the source object is copied to the address of the destination object. 行為`cpobj`未指定的來源和目的端物件的參考不是類別的語彙基元所代表的類別的執行個體的指標是否`classTok`(`typeref`或是`typedef`)，或如果`classTok`不代表實值型別。The behavior of `cpobj` is unspecified if the source and destination object references are not pointers to instances of the class represented by the class token `classTok` (a `typeref` or `typedef`), or if `classTok` does not represent a value type. 可能會擲回，如果偵測到無效的位址。 may be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 下列方法多載可以使用`cpobj`opcode:The following method overload can use the `cpobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Div
Public Shared ReadOnly Div As OpCode

summary.span: 除兩個值，並將做為浮點 (型別 ) 或商 (型別 ) 的結果推入至評估堆疊。

span.span: Divides two values and pushes the result as a floating-point (type ) or quotient (type ) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5B5B|divdiv|兩個值相除並傳回商數或浮點結果。Divides two values to return a quotient or floating-point result.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value1`除以`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is divided by `value2`. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1` div value2 滿足以下條件：`result` = `value1` div value2 satisfies the following conditions: |`result` | = | `value1` | / | `value2` |，和：| `result` | = | `value1` | / | `value2` |, and: 正負號 (`result`) = +，如果登入 (`value1`) = 號 (`value2`)，或-，如果登 (`value1`) ~ = 登 (`value2`)sign(`result`) = +, if sign(`value1`) = sign(`value2`), or -, if sign(`value1`) ~= sign(`value2`) `div`指令會計算結果，並將它推送到堆疊上。The `div` instruction computes the result and pushes it on the stack. 整數除法運算會截斷推向零。Integer division truncates towards zero. 有限數字為零的除法中，會產生正確簽署的無限值。Division of a finite number by zero produces the correctly signed infinite value. 除以零的零或無限大的無限值，便會產生 NaN （Not A-數字） 值。Dividing zero by zero or infinity by infinity produces the NaN (Not-A-Number) value. 任何數字除以無限大，會產生零值。Any number divided by infinity will produce a zero value. 整數類資料的作業會擲回如果結果無法表示的結果型別中。Integral operations throw if the result cannot be represented in the result type. 如果此情形`value1`的最大負數的值，和`value2`為-1。This can happen if `value1` is the maximum negative value, and `value2` is -1. 整數類資料的作業會擲回如果`value2`為零。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 請注意，在 Intel 平台上計算 (minint div-1) 時，會擲回。Note that on Intel-based platforms an is thrown when computing (minint div -1). 浮點運算絕不會擲回例外狀況 （會產生 Nan 或無限大改為）。Floating-point operations never throw an exception (they produce NaNs or infinities instead). 下列方法多載可以使用`div`opcode:The following method overload can use the `div` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Div_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Div_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 除以兩個不帶正負號的整數值，並將結果 () 推入至評估堆疊。

span.span: Divides two unsigned integer values and pushes the result () onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5C5C|div.undiv.un|兩個值相除，不帶正負號，並傳回商數。Divides two values, unsigned, returning a quotient.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value1`除以`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is divided by `value2`. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `div.un`指示計算`value1`除以`value2`，同時將其視為不帶正負號的整數和推播`result`堆疊上。The `div.un` instruction computes `value1` divided by `value2`, both taken as unsigned integers, and pushes the `result` on the stack. 下列方法多載可以使用`div.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `div.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Dup
Public Shared ReadOnly Dup As OpCode

summary.span: 複製評估堆疊上目前最頂端的值，然後將複製推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Copies the current topmost value on the evaluation stack, and then pushes the copy onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2525|dupdup|重複的堆疊頂端的值。Duplicates the value on the top of the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 是從重複資料刪除的堆疊取出。`value` is popped off of the stack for duplication. 3. `value` 是回推至堆疊。`value` is pushed back onto the stack. 4. 重複的值會推入至堆疊。A duplicate value is pushed onto the stack. `dup`指令重複項目堆疊中的最上層的項目，並將留在它之上的兩個相同的值。The `dup` instruction duplicates the top element of the stack, and leaves two identical values atop it. 下列方法多載可以使用`dup`opcode:The following method overload can use the `dup` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Endfilter
Public Shared ReadOnly Endfilter As OpCode

summary.span: 將控制權從例外狀況的 子句傳回 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 例外處理常式。

span.span: Transfers control from the clause of an exception back to the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) exception handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 11FE 11|endfilterendfilter|結束 SEH 例外狀況處理的篩選子句。End filter clause of SEH exception handling.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 會從堆疊; 推出`endfilter`執行時，控制權會轉移到例外狀況處理常式。`value` is popped from the stack; `endfilter` is executed and control is transferred to the exception handler. `Value` (這必須是型別`int32`的一組特定值的其中一個) 會傳回篩選子句。`Value` (which must be of type `int32` and is one of a specific set of values) is returned from the filter clause. 它應該是其中之一：It should be one of: - `exception_continue_search` (`value` = 0) 繼續搜尋例外狀況處理常式`exception_continue_search` (`value` = 0) to continue searching for an exception handler - `exception_execute_handler` (`value` = 1) 啟動第二個階段，就是最後區塊會執行直到與這個篩選條件子句的處理常式相關聯的例外狀況處理的所在。`exception_execute_handler` (`value` = 1) to start the second phase of exception handling where finally blocks are run until the handler associated with this filter clause is located. 發現時，會執行處理常式。Upon discovery, the handler is executed. 其他的整數值會產生未指定的結果。Other integer values will produce unspecified results. 使用的篩選器的進入點方法的例外狀況資料表中所示必須是在篩選條件的程式碼區塊的第一個指令。The entry point of a filter, as shown in the method's exception table, must be the first instruction in the filter's code block. `endfilter`指令必須是最後一個指令，篩選條件的程式碼區塊中 (因此只能有一個`endfilter`針對單一篩選條件的所有區塊)。The `endfilter` instruction must be the last instruction in the filter's code block (hence there can only be one `endfilter` for any single filter block). 在執行後`endfilter`指令，控制以邏輯方式流動回到 CLI 例外狀況處理機制。After executing the `endfilter` instruction, control logically flows back to the CLI exception handling mechanism. 控制項無法傳輸到篩選區塊以外，透過例外狀況機制。Control cannot be transferred into a filter block except through the exception mechanism. 控制項無法傳出使用篩選區塊以外`throw`指示或藉由執行最終`endfilter`指令。Control cannot be transferred out of a filter block except through the use of a `throw` instruction or by executing the final `endfilter` instruction. 您無法內嵌`try`區塊`filter`區塊。You cannot embed a `try` block within a `filter` block. 如果在擲回例外狀況`filter`區塊中，遭到攔截和值為 0 (`exception_continue_search`) 會傳回。If an exception is thrown inside the `filter` block, it is intercepted and a value of 0 (`exception_continue_search`) is returned. 下列方法多載可以使用`endfilter`opcode:The following method overload can use the `endfilter` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Endfinally
Public Shared ReadOnly Endfinally As OpCode

summary.span: 將控制權從例外狀況區塊的 或 子句傳回 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 例外處理常式。

span.span: Transfers control from the or clause of an exception block back to the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) exception handler.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DCDC|endfinallyendfinally

endfaultendfault|結束`finally`或`fault`例外狀況區塊的子句。Ends the `finally` or `fault` clause of an exception block.| 這個指示的轉換行為有任何堆疊。There are no stack transition behaviors for this instruction. `Endfinally` 並`endfault`表示結束`finally`或`fault`子句，該堆疊回溯可以繼續，直到例外狀況處理常式會叫用。`Endfinally` and `endfault` signal the end of the `finally` or `fault` clause so that stack unwinding can continue until the exception handler is invoked. `endfinally`或`endfault`指令會將控制權傳輸至 CLI 例外狀況機制。The `endfinally` or `endfault` instruction transfers control back to the CLI exception mechanism. [機制] 和 [下一步] 會搜尋`finally`如果受保護的區塊已結束與 leave 鏈結中的子句。The mechanism then searches for the next `finally` clause in the chain if the protected block was exited with a leave instruction. 如果受保護的區塊已結束並發生例外狀況，CLI 會搜尋在接下來`finally`或`fault`，或輸入例外狀況處理的第一個階段期間所選擇的例外狀況處理常式。If the protected block was exited with an exception, the CLI will search for the next `finally` or `fault`, or enter the exception handler chosen during the first pass of exception handling. `endfinally`指示可能只會顯示語彙內`finally`區塊。An `endfinally` instruction might only appear lexically within a `finally` block. 不同於`endfilter`的指示，在區塊結尾不需要`endfinally`的指示，而且可以有多個`endfinally`所需區塊中的指示。Unlike the `endfilter` instruction, there is no requirement that the block end with an `endfinally` instruction, and there can be as many `endfinally` instructions within the block as required. 這些相同的限制適用於`endfault`指令和`fault`區塊。These same restrictions apply to the `endfault` instruction and the `fault` block. 控制項無法傳輸到`finally`(或`fault`) 除了封鎖透過例外狀況機制。Control cannot be transferred into a `finally` (or `fault`) block except through the exception mechanism. 控制項無法轉移共`finally`(或`fault`) 除了封鎖使用`throw`指示或執行`endfinally`(或`endfault`) 指令。Control cannot be transferred out of a `finally` (or `fault`) block except through the use of a `throw` instruction or executing the `endfinally` (or `endfault`) instruction. 特別的是，您無法 「 切換 」 的`finally`(或`fault`) 區塊，或執行或是內的指令`finally`(或`fault`) 區塊。In particular, you cannot "fall out" of a `finally` (or `fault`) block or to execute a or instruction within a `finally` (or `fault`) block. 請注意，`endfault`和`endfinally`指示別名-它們對應至相同的 opcode。Note that the `endfault` and `endfinally` instructions are aliases - they correspond to the same opcode. 下列方法多載可用`endfinally`(`endfault`) 作業碼，以及`ILGenerator`方法。The following method overload can use the `endfinally` (`endfault`) opcode, as well as the `ILGenerator` method . - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode) - ILGenerator.EndExceptionBlock()ILGenerator.EndExceptionBlock()

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Initblk
Public Shared ReadOnly Initblk As OpCode

summary.span: 將指定位址上的指定記憶體區塊初始化為指定的大小和初始值。

span.span: Initializes a specified block of memory at a specific address to a given size and initial value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 18FE 18|initblkinitblk|設定每個位置中的指定值的記憶體區塊。Set each location in a block of memory to a given value.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 起始位址會推送至堆疊。A starting address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 初始化值會推入至堆疊。An initialization value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要初始化的位元組數目會推送至堆疊。The number of bytes to initialize is pushed onto the stack. 4. 位元組，初始化值的起始位址的數目會從堆疊彈出，並根據其值會執行初始化。The number of bytes, the initialization value, and the starting address are popped from the stack, and the initialization is performed as per their values. `initblk`指令會設定數字 (`unsigned int32`) 的指定位址開頭的位元組 (型別的`native int`， `&`，或`*`) 來初始化值 (類型的`unsigned int8`)。The `initblk` instruction sets the number (`unsigned int32`) of bytes starting at the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or `*`) to the initialization value (of type `unsigned int8`). `initblk` 假設的起始位址的對齊自然機器的大小。`initblk` assumes that the starting address is aligned to the natural size of the machine. 營運`initblk`可以改變指示錯誤的前或前置詞指令。The operation of the `initblk` instructions can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 可能會擲回，如果偵測到無效的位址。 may be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 下列方法多載可以使用`initblk`opcode:The following method overload can use the `initblk` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Initobj
Public Shared ReadOnly Initobj As OpCode

summary.span: 將位於指定位址之值類型的各個欄位，初始化為適當之基本類型的 null 參考或 0。

span.span: Initializes each field of the value type at a specified address to a null reference or a 0 of the appropriate primitive type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 15 < `T` >FE 15 < `T` >|`initobj` `typeTok``initobj` `typeTok`|初始化實值型別。Initializes a value type.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 實值型別，初始化的地址推送至堆疊。The address of the value type to initialize is pushed onto the stack. 2. 位址會從堆疊; 推出實值型別，在指定的位址會初始化為型別`typeTok`。The address is popped from the stack; the value type at the specified address is initialized as type `typeTok`. `initobj`指令會初始化推入位址所指定之值型別的每個欄位 (型別的`native int`， `&`，或`*`) 為 null 參考或 0，以適當的基本類型。The `initobj` instruction initializes each field of the value type specified by the pushed address (of type `native int`, `&`, or `*`) to a null reference or a 0 of the appropriate primitive type. 會呼叫這個方法之後，就有一個執行個體可供要呼叫的建構函式方法。After this method is called, the instance is ready for a constructor method to be called. 如果`typeTok`是參考型別，這個指令會有相同的效果`ldnull`後面`stind.ref`。If `typeTok` is a reference type, this instruction has the same effect as `ldnull` followed by `stind.ref`. 不同於，`initobj`不會呼叫建構函式方法。Unlike , `initobj` does not call the constructor method. `Initobj` 是要用於初始化實值型別，而`newobj`用來配置並初始化物件。`Initobj` is intended for initializing value types, while `newobj` is used to allocate and initialize objects. 下列方法多載可以使用`initobj`opcode:The following method overload can use the `initobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Isinst
Public Shared ReadOnly Isinst As OpCode

summary.span: 測試物件參考 (型別 ) 是否為特定類別的執行個體。

span.span: Tests whether an object reference (type ) is an instance of a particular class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |75 < `T` >75 < `T` >|isinst `class`isinst `class`|測試的執行個體的物件參考是否`class`、 傳回 null 參考或該類別的執行個體，或介面。Tests if an object reference is an instance of `class`, returning either a null reference or an instance of that class or interface.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考推送至堆疊。An object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 物件參考是從堆疊推出，並測試以查看它是否傳入類別的執行個體`class`。The object reference is popped from the stack and tested to see if it is an instance of the class passed in `class`. 3. 將結果 （物件參考或 null 參考） 推送至堆疊。The result (either an object reference or a null reference) is pushed onto the stack. `Class` 這中繼資料語彙基元，表示所需的類別。`Class` is a metadata token indicating the desired class. 堆疊頂端的物件類別會實作`class`(如果`class`是一種介面) 的衍生的類別是否`class`(如果`class`是規則的類別) 則將它轉換成輸入`class`和結果推入堆疊，完全如同呼叫。If the class of the object on the top of the stack implements `class` (if `class` is an interface) or is a derived class of `class` (if `class` is a regular class) then it is cast to type `class` and the result is pushed on the stack, exactly as though had been called. 否則為 null 參考為推送到堆疊上。Otherwise, a null reference is pushed on the stack. 如果物件參考本身是 null 參考，則`isinst`同樣的則傳回 null 參考。If the object reference itself is a null reference, then `isinst` likewise returns a null reference. 如果找不到類別，會擲回。 is thrown if class cannot be found. 這通常是偵測到的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。This is typically detected when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at runtime. 下列方法多載可以使用`isinst`opcode:The following method overload can use the `isinst` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Jmp
Public Shared ReadOnly Jmp As OpCode

summary.span: 結束目前方法，並跳至指定的方法。

span.span: Exits current method and jumps to specified method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |27 < `T` >27 < `T` >|jmp `method`jmp `method`|結束目前的方法，並跳至指定的方法。Exit current method and jump to specified method.| 這個指示的轉換行為有任何堆疊。There are no stack transition behaviors for this instruction. `jmp` （跳躍） 指示將控制權傳輸至指定的方法`method`，這是方法參考的中繼資料語彙基元。The `jmp` (jump) instruction transfers control to the method specified by `method`, which is a metadata token for a method reference. 目前的引數會傳輸至目標方法。The current arguments are transferred to the destination method. 執行此指令時，必須是空評估堆疊。The evaluation stack must be empty when this instruction is executed. 呼叫慣例、 類型與數量的引數，在目的地位址必須符合目前的方法。The calling convention, number and type of arguments at the destination address must match that of the current method. `jmp`指令不能用來傳輸控制項，共`try`， `filter`， `catch`，或`finally`區塊。The `jmp` instruction cannot be used to transferred control out of a `try`, `filter`, `catch`, or `finally` block. 下列方法多載可以使用`jmp`opcode:The following method overload can use the `jmp` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldarg
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldarg As OpCode

summary.span: 載入引數 (為指定的索引值所參考) 至堆疊。

span.span: Loads an argument (referenced by a specified index value) onto the stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 09 < `unsigned int16` >FE 09 < `unsigned int16` >|ldarg `index`ldarg `index`|載入位於引數`index`至堆疊。Load argument at `index` onto stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 在引數值`index`推送至堆疊。The argument value at `index` is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg`指令會在索引的引數推入`index`，其中引數則是從 0 開始，至評估堆疊。The `ldarg` instruction pushes the argument indexed at `index`, where arguments are indexed from 0 onwards, onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg`指令可以用來載入藉由複製從傳入的引數的實值類型或基本值至堆疊。The `ldarg` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 引數，目前的方法簽章所指定的型別相同的引數值的類型。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 程序，使用可變長度引數清單，如`ldarg`指示可以僅用於初始的固定引數，不是這些簽章的變動部分 (請參閱指令，如需詳細資訊)。For procedures that take a variable-length argument list, the `ldarg` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature (see the instruction for more details). 存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的引數會展開以輸入`int32`時載入至堆疊。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮點數的值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 下列方法多載可以使用`ldarg`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldarg` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit (OpCode，short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldarg_0
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldarg_0 As OpCode

summary.span: 載入位於索引 0 的引數至評估堆疊。

span.span: Loads the argument at index 0 onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0202|ldarg.0ldarg.0|載入至堆疊的引數 0Load argument 0 onto stack| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位於索引 0 的引數值推入至堆疊。The argument value at index 0 is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg.0`指令都是有效的編碼方式，來載入位於索引 0 的引數值。The `ldarg.0` instruction is an efficient encoding for loading the argument value at index 0. `ldarg.0`指令會推入至評估堆疊的 0 編製索引的引數。The `ldarg.0` instruction pushes the argument indexed at 0 onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg.0`指令可以用來載入藉由複製從傳入的引數的實值類型或基本值至堆疊。The `ldarg.0` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 引數，目前的方法簽章所指定的型別相同的引數值的類型。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的引數會展開以輸入`int32`時載入至堆疊。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮點數的值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 下列方法多載可以使用`ldarg.0`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldarg.0` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldarg_1
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldarg_1 As OpCode

summary.span: 載入位於索引 1 的引數至評估堆疊。

span.span: Loads the argument at index 1 onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0303|ldarg.1ldarg.1|載入至堆疊的引數 1。Load argument 1 onto stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位於索引 1 的引數值推入至堆疊。The argument value at index 1 is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg.1`指令都是有效的編碼方式，來載入位於索引 1 的引數值。The `ldarg.1` instruction is an efficient encoding for loading the argument value at index 1. `ldarg.1`指令會推入至評估堆疊的 1 編製索引的引數。The `ldarg.1` instruction pushes the argument indexed at 1 onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg.1`指令可以用來載入藉由複製從傳入的引數的實值類型或基本值至堆疊。The `ldarg.1` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 引數，目前的方法簽章所指定的型別相同的引數值的類型。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的引數會展開以輸入`int32`時載入至堆疊。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮點數的值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 下列方法多載可以使用`ldarg.1`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldarg.1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0404|ldarg.2ldarg.2|載入至堆疊的引數 2。Load argument 2 onto stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位於索引 2 的引數值推入至堆疊。The argument value at index 2 is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg.2`指令都是有效的編碼方式，來載入位於索引 2 的引數值。The `ldarg.2` instruction is an efficient encoding for loading the argument value at index 2. `ldarg.2`指令會推入至評估堆疊的 2 編製索引的引數。The `ldarg.2` instruction pushes the argument indexed at 2 onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg.2`指令可以用來載入藉由複製從傳入的引數的實值類型或基本值至堆疊。The `ldarg.2` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 引數，目前的方法簽章所指定的型別相同的引數值的類型。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的引數會展開以輸入`int32`時載入至堆疊。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮點數的值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 下列方法多載可以使用`ldarg.2`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldarg.2` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldarg_S
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldarg_S As OpCode

summary.span: 載入引數 (為指定的簡短形式索引所參考) 至評估堆疊。

span.span: Loads the argument (referenced by a specified short form index) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0E < `unsigned int8` >0E < `unsigned int8` >|ldarg.s `index`ldarg.s `index`|載入位於引數`index`至堆疊，簡短形式。Load argument at `index` onto stack, short form.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 在引數值`index`推送至堆疊。The argument value at `index` is pushed onto the stack. `ldarg.s`指令都是有效的編碼方式為載入引數從 4 到 255 的編製索引。The `ldarg.s` instruction is an efficient encoding for loading arguments indexed from 4 through 255. `ldarg.s`指令會在索引的引數推入`index`，其中引數則是從 0 開始，至評估堆疊。The `ldarg.s` instruction pushes the argument indexed at `index`, where arguments are indexed from 0 onwards, onto the evaluation stack. `ldarg.s`指令可以用來載入藉由複製從傳入的引數的實值類型或基本值至堆疊。The `ldarg.s` instruction can be used to load a value type or a primitive value onto the stack by copying it from an incoming argument. 引數，目前的方法簽章所指定的型別相同的引數值的類型。The type of the argument value is the same as the type of the argument, as specified by the current method's signature. 程序，使用可變長度引數清單，如`ldarg.s`指示可以僅用於初始的固定引數，不是這些簽章的變動部分 (請參閱指令，如需詳細資訊)。For procedures that take a variable-length argument list, the `ldarg.s` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature (see the instruction for more details). 存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的引數會展開以輸入`int32`時載入至堆疊。Arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮點數的值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 下列方法多載可以使用`ldarg.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldarg.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，byte）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldarga
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldarga As OpCode

summary.span: 載入引數位址至評估堆疊。

span.span: Load an argument address onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0A < `unsigned int16` >FE 0A < `unsigned int16` >|ldarga `index`ldarga `index`|擷取由編製索引的引數位址`index`。Fetch the address of argument indexed by `index`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 地址`addr`編製索引的引數的`index`推送至堆疊。The address `addr` of the argument indexed by `index` is pushed onto the stack. `ldarga`指令會擷取位址 (型別的`*`) 以編製索引的引數的`index`，其中的引數則是從 0 開始。The `ldarga` instruction fetches the address (of type `*`) of the argument indexed by `index`, where arguments are indexed from 0 onwards. 位址`addr`一律會在目標電腦上的自然界限對齊。The address `addr` is always aligned to a natural boundary on the target machine. 如需使用可變長度引數清單的程序`ldarga`指示可以僅用於初始的固定引數不簽章的變動部分中的那些。For procedures that take a variable-length argument list, the `ldarga` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. `ldarga` 用於依 ref 參數傳遞。`ldarga` is used for by-ref parameter passing. 其他情況下，如和應該使用。For other cases, and should be used. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldarga`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldarga` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit (OpCode，short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldarga_S
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldarga_S As OpCode

summary.span: 以簡短形式，載入引數位址至評估堆疊。

span.span: Load an argument address, in short form, onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0F < `unsigned int8` >0F < `unsigned int8` >|ldarga.s `index`ldarga.s `index`|擷取由編製索引的引數位址`index`，簡短形式。Fetch the address of argument indexed by `index`, short form.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 地址`addr`編製索引的引數的`index`推送至堆疊。The address `addr` of the argument indexed by `index` is pushed onto the stack. `ldarga.s` (簡短形式`ldarga`) 應該使用引數的數字 0 到 255，而且是更有效率的編碼方式。`ldarga.s` (the short form of `ldarga`) should be used for argument numbers 0 through 255, and is a more efficient encoding. `ldarga.s`指令會擷取位址 (型別的`*`) 以編製索引的引數的`index`，其中的引數則是從 0 開始。The `ldarga.s` instruction fetches the address (of type`*`) of the argument indexed by `index`, where arguments are indexed from 0 onwards. 位址`addr`一律會在目標電腦上的自然界限對齊。The address `addr` is always aligned to a natural boundary on the target machine. 如需使用可變長度引數清單的程序`ldarga.s`指示可以僅用於初始的固定引數不簽章的變動部分中的那些。For procedures that take a variable-length argument list, the `ldarga.s` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. `ldarga.s` 用於依 ref 參數傳遞。`ldarga.s` is used for by-ref parameter passing. 其他情況下，如和應該使用。For other cases, and should be used. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldarga.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldarga.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，byte）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldc_I4
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldc_I4 As OpCode

summary.span: 推入型別 的提供值至評估堆疊做為 。

span.span: Pushes a supplied value of type onto the evaluation stack as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |20 < `int32` >20 < `int32` >|ldc.i4 `num`ldc.i4 `num`|將值推入`num`至堆疊。Pushes the value `num` onto the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值`num`推送至堆疊。The value `num` is pushed onto the stack. 請注意，有特殊的簡短 （並因此會更有效率） 編碼的整數-128 到 127，以及特別是簡短的編碼方式，-1 到 8。Note that there are special short (and hence more efficient) encodings for the integers -128 through 127, and especially short encodings for -1 through 8. 所有較短的編碼會推入堆疊的 4 位元組整數。All short encodings push 4 byte integers on the stack. 較長的編碼會用於 8 位元組整數和 4 和 8 位元組浮點數，以及無法放入簡短形式的 4 位元組值。Longer encodings are used for 8 byte integers and 4 and 8 byte floating-point numbers, as well as 4-byte values that do not fit in the short forms. 有三種方式可推送至堆疊的 8 位元組整數常數There are three ways to push an 8 byte integer constant onto the stack 1. 使用指示必須以多個 32 位元的常數。Use the instruction for constants that must be expressed in more than 32 bits. 2. 使用後面的指示需要 9 到 32 位元的常數。Use the instruction followed by a for constants that require 9 to 32 bits. 3. 使用簡短形式指令，後面跟著可以表示小於或等於 8 位元數的常數。Use a short form instruction followed by a for constants that can be expressed in 8 or fewer bits. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldc.i4`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldc.i4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit (OpCode，int)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, int)

Public Shared ReadOnly Ldc_I4_0 As OpCode

span.span: Pushes the integer value of 0 onto the evaluation stack as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |1616|ldc.i4.0ldc.i4.0|推送至堆疊的 0。Pushes 0 onto the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值 0 推入至堆疊。The value 0 is pushed onto the stack. 這是特殊短的編碼方式的整數值 0 推播。This is a special short encoding for the push of the integer value 0. 所有特殊較短的編碼會推入堆疊的 4 位元組整數。All special short encodings push 4 byte integers on the stack. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldc.i4.0`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldc.i4.0` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Pushes the supplied value onto the evaluation stack as an , short form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |1F < `int8` >1F < `int8` >|ldc.i4.s `num`ldc.i4.s `num`|推播`num`至堆疊`int32`，簡短形式。Pushes `num` onto the stack as `int32`, short form.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 值`num`推送至堆疊。The value `num` is pushed onto the stack. `ldc.i4.s` 是以更有效率的編碼方式，就將整數介於-128 的資料到 127 推送至評估堆疊。`ldc.i4.s` is a more efficient encoding for pushing the integers from -128 to 127 onto the evaluation stack. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldc.i4.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldc.i4.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，byte）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

Public Shared ReadOnly Ldelem As OpCode

summary.span: 將位於指定之陣列索引處的項目當做指令中指定的類型載入至評估堆疊的頂端。

span.span: Loads the element at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as the type specified in the instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A3 < `T` >A3 < `T` >|ldelem `typeTok`ldelem `typeTok`|載入處的項目`index`類型堆疊的頂端`typeTok`。Loads the element at `index` onto the top of the stack as type `typeTok`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考`array`推送至堆疊。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送至堆疊。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 並`array`會從堆疊; 推出位置處儲存的值`index`在`array`查閱。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the value stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 的值會推入至堆疊。The value is pushed onto the stack. `ldelem`指令會載入具有索引的項目值`index`(型別`native int`) 中以零為起始的一維陣列`array`並將它放在堆疊的頂端。The `ldelem` instruction loads the value of the element with index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示型別的值`O`。Arrays are objects, and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 傳回值的型別由權杖`typeTok`指令中。The type of the return value is specified by the token `typeTok` in the instruction. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於上限`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the upper bound of `array`. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldelem`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldelem` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldelem_I
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldelem_I As OpCode

summary.span: 將位於指定陣列索引處型別為 的元素當做 載入至評估堆疊的頂端。

span.span: Loads the element with type at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9797|ldelem.ildelem.i|載入項目類型`native int`位於`index`堆疊的頂端`native int`。Loads the element with type `native int` at `index` onto the top of the stack as a `native int`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考`array`推送至堆疊。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送至堆疊。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 並`array`會從堆疊; 推出位置處儲存的值`index`在`array`查閱。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the value stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 的值會推入至堆疊。The value is pushed onto the stack. `ldelem.i`指令會載入具有索引的項目值`index`(型別`native int`) 中以零為起始的一維陣列`array`並將它放在堆疊的頂端。The `ldelem.i` instruction loads the value of the element with index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示類型的值由`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 傳回值`ldelem.i`是`native int`。The return value for `ldelem.i` is `native int`. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`(不`native int`) 時載入至評估堆疊。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`array`未持有必要的型別項目。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於的繫結`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldelem.i`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldelem.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9494|ldelem.i4ldelem.i4|載入項目類型`int32`位於`index`堆疊的頂端`int32`。Loads the element with type `int32` at `index` onto the top of the stack as an `int32`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考`array`推送至堆疊。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送至堆疊。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 並`array`會從堆疊; 推出位置處儲存的值`index`在`array`查閱。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the value stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 的值會推入至堆疊。The value is pushed onto the stack. `ldelem.i4`指令會載入具有索引的項目值`index`(型別`native int`) 中以零為起始的一維陣列`array`並將它放在堆疊的頂端。The `ldelem.i4` instruction loads the value of the element with index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示類型的值由`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 傳回值`ldelem.i4`是`int32`。The return value for `ldelem.i4` is `int32`. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`(不`native int`) 時載入至評估堆疊。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`array`未持有必要的型別項目。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於的繫結`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldelem.i4`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldelem.i4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9898|ldelem.r4ldelem.r4|載入項目類型`float32`位於`index`做為類型堆疊的頂端`F`。Loads the element with type `float32` at `index` onto the top of the stack as a type `F`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考`array`推送至堆疊。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送至堆疊。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 並`array`會從堆疊; 推出位置處儲存的值`index`在`array`查閱。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the value stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 的值會推入至堆疊。The value is pushed onto the stack. `ldelem.r4`指令會載入具有索引的項目值`index`(型別`native int`) 中以零為起始的一維陣列`array`並將它放在堆疊的頂端。The `ldelem.r4` instruction loads the value of the element with index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示類型的值由`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 傳回值`ldelem.r4`是`float32`。The return value for `ldelem.r4` is `float32`. 浮點數的值會轉換成輸入`F`時載入至評估堆疊。Floating-point values are converted to type `F` when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`array`未持有必要的型別項目。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於的繫結`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldelem.r4`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldelem.r4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
