span.span: Loads the address of the array element at a specified array index onto the top of the evaluation stack as type (managed pointer).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8F < `T` >8F < `T` >|ldelema `class`ldelema `class`|在陣列元素的位址載入`index`的型別評估堆疊頂端`&`（managed 的指標）。Loads the address of the array element at `index` onto the top of the evaluation stack as type `&` (managed pointer).| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考`array`推送至堆疊。An object reference `array` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值`index`推送至堆疊。An index value `index` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `index` 並`array`會從堆疊; 推出儲存位置的位址`index`在`array`查閱。`index` and `array` are popped from the stack; the address stored at position `index` in `array` is looked up. 4. 地址推送至堆疊。The address is pushed onto the stack. `ldelema`用來擷取物件的陣列中特定索引處的物件的位址 (型別`class`)。The `ldelema` is used to retrieve the address of an object at a particular index in an array of objects (of type `class`). `ldelema`指令載入位址的索引處的值`index`(型別`native int`) 中以零為起始的一維陣列`array`並將它放在堆疊的頂端。The `ldelema` instruction loads the address of the value at index `index` (type `native int`) in the zero-based one-dimensional array `array` and places it on the top of the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示類型的值由`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 值必須是型別`class`傳遞與指示。The value must be of type `class` passed with the instruction. 傳回值`ldelema`是 managed 的指標 (型別`&`)。The return value for `ldelema` is a managed pointer (type `&`). 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`(不`native int`) 時載入至評估堆疊。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`array`未持有必要的型別項目。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於的繫結`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldelema`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldelema` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldfld
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldfld As OpCode

summary.span: 尋找物件中的欄位值，該值的參考目前位於評估堆疊中。

span.span: Finds the value of a field in the object whose reference is currently on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7B < `T` >7B < `T` >|ldfld `field`ldfld `field`|推入指定的物件至堆疊中的欄位值。Pushes the value of a field in a specified object onto the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考 （或指標） 推送至堆疊。An object reference (or pointer) is pushed onto the stack. 2. 物件參考 （或指標） 會從堆疊; 中推出找到的物件中指定的欄位值。The object reference (or pointer) is popped from the stack; the value of the specified field in the object is found. 3. 在欄位中儲存的值推入至堆疊。The value stored in the field is pushed onto the stack. `ldfld`指令會推入至堆疊的物件中欄位的值。The `ldfld` instruction pushes the value of a field located in an object onto the stack. 物件必須位於堆疊的物件參考 (型別`O`)，managed 的指標 (型別`&`) 的 unmanaged 的指標 (型別`native int`)，暫時性指標 (型別`*`)，或實值類型的執行個體。The object must be on the stack as an object reference (type `O`), a managed pointer (type `&`), an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`), a transient pointer (type `*`), or an instance of a value type. 可驗證的程式碼中不允許使用的 unmanaged 指標。The use of an unmanaged pointer is not permitted in verifiable code. 指定物件的欄位的欄位成員必須參考中繼資料語彙基元。The object's field is specified by a metadata token that must refer to a field member. 傳回的型別是與欄位關聯的一個相同。The return type is the same as the one associated with the field. 欄位可能是 （在此情況下的物件不得為 null 參考） 的執行個體欄位或靜態欄位。The field may be either an instance field (in which case the object must not be a null reference) or a static field. `ldfld`指令可以加上一個或兩個和前置詞。The `ldfld` instruction can be preceded by either or both of the and prefixes. 如果物件是 null，且該欄位不是靜態，會擲回。 is thrown if the object is null and the field is not static. 如果在中繼資料中找不到指定的欄位，會擲回。 is thrown if the specified field is not found in the metadata. 這通常會檢查 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換成原生程式碼，不是在執行階段時。This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at run time. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldfld`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldfld` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldflda
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldflda As OpCode

summary.span: 尋找物件中的欄位位址，該位址的參考目前位於評估堆疊中。

span.span: Finds the address of a field in the object whose reference is currently on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7C < `T` >7C < `T` >|ldflda `field`ldflda `field`|推入的位址`field`中指定的物件至堆疊。Pushes the address of `field` in a specified object onto the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考 （或指標） 推送至堆疊。An object reference (or pointer) is pushed onto the stack. 2. 物件參考 （或指標） 會從堆疊; 中推出找到的物件中的指定欄位的位址。The object reference (or pointer) is popped from the stack; the address of the specified field in the object is found. 3. 指定欄位的位址推送至堆疊。The address of the specified field is pushed onto the stack. `ldflda`指令會推入至堆疊的物件中欄位的位址。The `ldflda` instruction pushes the address of a field located in an object onto the stack. 物件必須位於堆疊的物件參考 (型別`O`)，managed 的指標 (型別`&`) 的 unmanaged 的指標 (型別`native int`)，暫時性指標 (型別`*`)，或實值類型的執行個體。The object must be on the stack as an object reference (type `O`), a managed pointer (type `&`), an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`), a transient pointer (type `*`), or an instance of a value type. 可驗證的程式碼中不允許使用的 unmanaged 指標。The use of an unmanaged pointer is not permitted in verifiable code. 指定物件的欄位的欄位成員必須參考中繼資料語彙基元。The object's field is specified by a metadata token that must refer to a field member. 所傳回的值`ldflda`是 managed 的指標 (型別`&`) 除非物件已推送至堆疊的 unmanaged 指標，在此情況下傳回地址還有的 unmanaged 的指標 (型別`native int`)。The value returned by `ldflda` is a managed pointer (type `&`) unless the object is pushed onto the stack as an unmanaged pointer, in which case the return address is also an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`). `ldflda`指令可以加上一個或兩個和前置詞。The `ldflda` instruction can be preceded by either or both of the and prefixes. 如果物件不是從中進行存取的應用程式定義域中，會擲回。 is thrown if the object is not within the application domain from which it is being accessed. 無法載入存取的應用程式定義域內不是欄位的位址。The address of a field that is not inside the accessing application domain cannot be loaded. 如果物件是 null，且該欄位不是靜態，會擲回。 is thrown if the object is null and the field is not static. 如果在中繼資料中找不到指定的欄位，會擲回。 is thrown if the specified field is not found in the metadata. 這通常會檢查 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換成原生程式碼，不是在執行階段時。This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at run time. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldflda`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldflda` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldftn
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldftn As OpCode

summary.span: 推入實作特定方法之機器碼的 Unmanaged 指標 (型別 ) 至評估堆疊。

span.span: Pushes an unmanaged pointer (type ) to the native code implementing a specific method onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 06 < `T` >FE 06 < `T` >|instrukce `method`ldftn `method`|將指標所參考的方法推入`method`堆疊上。Pushes a pointer to a method referenced by `method` on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 特定方法的 unmanaged 的指標會推送至堆疊。The unmanaged pointer to a specific method is pushed onto the stack. 特定的方法 (`method`) 可以用來呼叫看它所參考的 managed 的方法 （或從 managed 轉換到 unmanaged 程式碼 stub） 的指示。The specific method (`method`) can be called using the instruction if it references a managed method (or a stub that transitions from managed to unmanaged code). 使用 CLR 的呼叫慣例的原生程式碼點傳回的值。The value returned points to native code using the CLR calling convention. 這個方法的指標不應該傳遞至未受管理的原生程式碼中，但會做為回呼常式。This method pointer should not be passed to unmanaged native code as a callback routine. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldftn`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldftn` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldind_I
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldind_I As OpCode

summary.span: 將型別 的值做為 ，間接載入至評估堆疊。

span.span: Loads a value of type as a onto the evaluation stack indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |4D4D|ldind.ildind.i|載入`native int`位址的值`addr`至堆疊`native int`。Loads the `native int` value at address `addr` onto the stack as a `native int`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位址會推送至堆疊。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 位址會從堆疊; 推出擷取位於位址的值。The address is popped from the stack; the value located at the address is fetched. 3. 將擷取的值推入至堆疊。The fetched value is pushed onto the stack. `ldind.i`間接載入指令`native int`值，從指定的位址 (型別的`native int`， `&`，或 \*) 至堆疊`native int`。The `ldind.i` instruction indirectly loads a `native int` value from the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or \*) onto the stack as a `native int`. 所有`ldind`的快速鍵指示指定相對應的內建實值類別的指示。All of the `ldind` instructions are shortcuts for a instruction that specifies the corresponding built-in value class. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`(不`native int`) 時載入至評估堆疊。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`輸入時載入至評估堆疊。Floating-point values are converted to `F` type when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 正確 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 可確保`ldind`指示用於指標的類型與一致的方式。Correctly-formed Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) ensures that the `ldind` instructions are used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 一開始推送至堆疊的位址必須對齊的正常大小的電腦上的物件或可能會發生 (請參閱前置詞的預防措施指示)。The address initially pushed onto the stack must be aligned to the natural size of objects on the machine or a can occur (see the prefix instruction for preventative measures). 所有傳回位址的 MSIL 指令的結果 (例如和) 安全地對齊。The results of all MSIL instructions that return addresses (for example, and ) are safely aligned. 對於大於 1 個位元組的資料類型，位元組順序。 相依於目標 CPUFor datatypes larger than 1 byte, the byte ordering is dependent on the target CPU. 取決於位元組順序的程式碼可能無法執行所有平台上。Code that depends on byte ordering might not run on all platforms. 可能會擲回，如果偵測到無效的位址。 can be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldind.i`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldind.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 將 型別的值做為 間接載入至評估堆疊。

span.span: Loads a value of type as an onto the evaluation stack indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |4646|ldind.i1ldind.i1|載入`int8`位址的值`addr`至堆疊`int32`。Loads the `int8` value at address `addr` onto the stack as an `int32`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位址會推送至堆疊。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 位址會從堆疊; 推出擷取位於位址的值。The address is popped from the stack; the value located at the address is fetched. 3. 將擷取的值會推入堆疊...The fetched value is pushed onto the stack.. `ldind.i1`間接載入指令`int8`值，從指定的位址 (型別的`native int`， `&`，或 \*) 至堆疊`int32`。The `ldind.i1` instruction indirectly loads an `int8` value from the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or \*) onto the stack as an `int32`. 所有`ldind`的快速鍵指示指定相對應的內建實值類別的指示。All of the `ldind` instructions are shortcuts for a instruction that specifies the corresponding built-in value class. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`(不`native int`) 時載入至評估堆疊。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`輸入時載入至評估堆疊。Floating-point values are converted to `F` type when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 正確 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 可確保`ldind`指示用於指標的類型與一致的方式。Correctly-formed Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) ensures that the `ldind` instructions are used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 一開始推送至堆疊的位址必須對齊的正常大小的電腦上的物件或可能會發生 (請參閱前置詞的預防措施指示)。The address initially pushed onto the stack must be aligned to the natural size of objects on the machine or a can occur (see the prefix instruction for preventative measures). 所有傳回位址的 MSIL 指令的結果 (例如和) 安全地對齊。The results of all MSIL instructions that return addresses (for example, and ) are safely aligned. 對於大於 1 個位元組的資料類型，位元組順序。 相依於目標 CPUFor datatypes larger than 1 byte, the byte ordering is dependent on the target CPU. 取決於位元組順序的程式碼可能無法執行所有平台上。Code that depends on byte ordering might not run on all platforms. 可能會擲回，如果偵測到無效的位址。 can be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldind.i1`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldind.i1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Loads a value of type as an onto the evaluation stack indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |4A4A|ldind.i4ldind.i4|載入`int32`位址的值`addr`至堆疊`int32`。Loads the `int32` value at address `addr` onto the stack as an `int32`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位址會推送至堆疊。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 位址會從堆疊; 推出擷取位於位址的值。The address is popped from the stack; the value located at the address is fetched. 3. 將擷取的值推入至堆疊。The fetched value is pushed onto the stack. `ldind.i4`間接載入指令`int32`值，從指定的位址 (型別的`native int`， `&`，或 \*) 至堆疊`int32`。The `ldind.i4` instruction indirectly loads an `int32` value from the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or \*) onto the stack as an `int32`. 所有`ldind`的快速鍵指示指定相對應的內建實值類別的指示。All of the `ldind` instructions are shortcuts for a instruction that specifies the corresponding built-in value class. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`(不`native int`) 時載入至評估堆疊。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`輸入時載入至評估堆疊。Floating-point values are converted to `F` type when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 正確 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 可確保`ldind`指示用於指標的類型與一致的方式。Correctly-formed Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) ensures that the `ldind` instructions are used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 一開始推送至堆疊的位址必須對齊的正常大小的電腦上的物件或可能會發生 (請參閱前置詞的預防措施指示)。The address initially pushed onto the stack must be aligned to the natural size of objects on the machine or a can occur (see the prefix instruction for preventative measures). 所有傳回位址的 MSIL 指令的結果 (例如和) 安全地對齊。The results of all MSIL instructions that return addresses (for example, and ) are safely aligned. 對於大於 1 個位元組的資料類型，位元組順序。 相依於目標 CPUFor datatypes larger than 1 byte, the byte ordering is dependent on the target CPU. 取決於位元組順序的程式碼可能無法執行所有平台上。Code that depends on byte ordering might not run on all platforms. 可能會擲回，如果偵測到無效的位址。 can be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldind.i4`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldind.i4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Ldind_I8 As OpCode

summary.span: 將 型別的值做為 間接載入至評估堆疊。

span.span: Loads a value of type as an onto the evaluation stack indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |4B4B|ldind.u4ldind.u4|載入`unsigned int32`位址的值`addr`至堆疊`int32`。Loads the `unsigned int32` value at address `addr` onto the stack as an `int32`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位址會推送至堆疊。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 位址會從堆疊; 推出擷取位於位址的值。The address is popped from the stack; the value located at the address is fetched. 3. 將擷取的值推入至堆疊。The fetched value is pushed onto the stack. `ldind.u4`間接載入指令`unsigned int32`值，從指定的位址 (型別的`native int`， `&`，或 \*) 至堆疊`int32`。The `ldind.u4` instruction indirectly loads an `unsigned int32` value from the specified address (of type `native int`, `&`, or \*) onto the stack as an `int32`. 所有`ldind`的快速鍵指示指定相對應的內建實值類別的指示。All of the `ldind` instructions are shortcuts for a instruction that specifies the corresponding built-in value class. 請注意少於 4 個位元組的整數值已擴充來`int32`(不`native int`) 時載入至評估堆疊。Note that integer values of less than 4 bytes are extended to `int32` (not `native int`) when they are loaded onto the evaluation stack. 浮點數的值會轉換成`F`輸入時載入至評估堆疊。Floating-point values are converted to `F` type when loaded onto the evaluation stack. 正確 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 可確保`ldind`指示用於指標的類型與一致的方式。Correctly-formed Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) ensures that the `ldind` instructions are used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 一開始推送至堆疊的位址必須對齊的正常大小的電腦上的物件或可能會發生 (請參閱前置詞的預防措施指示)。The address initially pushed onto the stack must be aligned to the natural size of objects on the machine or a can occur (see the prefix instruction for preventative measures). 所有傳回位址的 MSIL 指令的結果 (例如和) 安全地對齊。The results of all MSIL instructions that return addresses (for example, and ) are safely aligned. 對於大於 1 個位元組的資料類型，位元組順序。 相依於目標 CPUFor datatypes larger than 1 byte, the byte ordering is dependent on the target CPU. 取決於位元組順序的程式碼可能無法執行所有平台上。Code that depends on byte ordering might not run on all platforms. 可能會擲回，如果偵測到無效的位址。 can be thrown if an invalid address is detected. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldind.u4`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldind.u4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldlen
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldlen As OpCode

summary.span: 推送以零為起始的一維陣列的項目數至評估堆疊。

span.span: Pushes the number of elements of a zero-based, one-dimensional array onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8E8E|ldlenldlen|推播長度 (型別`natural unsigned int`) 的堆疊上的陣列。Pushes the length (of type `natural unsigned int`) of an array on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 陣列的物件參考推送至堆疊。An object reference to an array is pushed onto the stack. 2. 陣列參考從堆疊推出，並計算長度。The array reference is popped from the stack and the length is computed. 3. 長度會推送至堆疊。The length is pushed onto the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示類型的值由`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 將會傳回長度為`natural unsigned int`。The length is returned as a `natural unsigned int`. 如果陣列參考為 null 參考，會擲回。 is thrown if the array reference is a null reference. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldlen`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldlen` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldloc
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldloc As OpCode

summary.span: 載入位於指定索引的區域變數至評估堆疊。

span.span: Loads the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0C < `unsigned int16` >FE 0C < `unsigned int16` >|ldloc `index`ldloc `index`|載入位於索引的區域變數`index`至堆疊。Loads the local variable at index `index` onto stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 指定索引處的區域變數值推送至堆疊。The local variable value at the specified index is pushed onto the stack. `ldloc`指令會推入內容的本機變數數目在傳遞的索引至評估堆疊，區域變數所在及更新版本編號為 0。The `ldloc` instruction pushes the contents of the local variable number at the passed index onto the evaluation stack, where the local variables are numbered 0 onwards. 本機變數會初始化旗標，方法是，則為 true 時，才進入方法之前初始化為 0。Local variables are initialized to 0 before entering the method only if the initialize flag on the method is true. 有 65,535 (2 ^16-1） 本機變數可能 (0-65534)。There are 65,535 (2^16-1) local variables possible (0-65,534). 索引 65,535 無效，因為可能的實作會使用 2 位元組的整數，來追蹤這兩個區域的索引，以及指定方法的區域變數的總數。Index 65,535 is not valid since likely implementations will use a 2-byte integer to track both a local's index, along with the total number of locals for a given method. 如果 65535 的索引已經變成有效，它將需要更多的整數，用來追蹤這類方法中的區域變數的數目。If an index of 65535 had been made valid, it would require a wider integer to track the number of locals in such a method. `ldloc.0`， `ldloc.1`， `ldloc.2`，和`ldloc.3`指示可讓您提供有效的編碼方式，來存取前四個區域變數。The `ldloc.0`, `ldloc.1`, `ldloc.2`, and `ldloc.3` instructions provide an efficient encoding for accessing the first four local variables. 方法標頭中指定的本機變數的類型相同之值的類型。The type of the value is the same as the type of the local variable, which is specified in the method header. 請參閱小於 4 個位元組會展開成輸入的資料分割 I.本機變數`int32`時載入至堆疊。See Partition I. Local variables that are smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮點數的值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 下列方法多載可以使用`ldloc`opcode:The following method overloads can use the `ldloc` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 LocalBuilder）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder) - ILGenerator.Emit (OpCode，short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |11 < `unsigned int8` >11 < `unsigned int8` >|ldloc.s `index`ldloc.s `index`|載入位於索引的區域變數`index`至堆疊，簡短形式。Loads the local variable at index `index` onto stack, short form.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 指定索引處的區域變數值推送至堆疊。The local variable value at the specified index is pushed onto the stack. `ldloc.s`指令會推入內容的本機變數數目在傳遞的索引至評估堆疊，區域變數所在及更新版本編號為 0。The `ldloc.s` instruction pushes the contents of the local variable number at the passed index onto the evaluation stack, where the local variables are numbered 0 onwards. 如果初始化旗標，方法是，則為 true，進入方法之前，本機變數會初始化為 0。Local variables are initialized to 0 before entering the method if the initialize flag on the method is true. 有 256 (2 ^8) 中的區域變數可能 (0-255) 的簡短形式，這是以更有效率的編碼方式，就比`ldloc`。There are 256 (2^8) local variables possible (0-255) in the short form, which is a more efficient encoding than `ldloc`. 方法標頭中指定的本機變數的類型相同之值的類型。The type of the value is the same as the type of the local variable, which is specified in the method header. 請參閱小於 4 個位元組會展開成輸入的資料分割 I.本機變數`int32`時載入至堆疊。See Partition I. Local variables that are smaller than 4 bytes long are expanded to type `int32` when they are loaded onto the stack. 浮點數的值會展開成其原生的大小 (型別`F`)。Floating-point values are expanded to their native size (type `F`). 下列方法多載可以使用`ldloc.s`opcode:The following method overloads can use the `ldloc.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 LocalBuilder）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder) - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，byte）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

summary.span: 載入位於指定索引的區域變數位址至評估堆疊。

span.span: Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE OD < `unsigned int16` >FE OD < `unsigned int16` >|ldloca `index`ldloca `index`|在本機變數的位址載入`index`至評估堆疊。Loads the address of the local variable at `index` onto the evaluation stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 儲存在位於指定索引的區域變數的位址推送至堆疊。The address stored in the local variable at the specified index is pushed onto the stack. `ldloca`指令會推入本機變數的數字的位址傳遞的索引，到堆疊上，在本機變數所在及更新版本編號為 0。The `ldloca` instruction pushes the address of the local variable number at the passed index onto the stack, where local variables are numbered 0 onwards. 推送到堆疊上的值已正確對齊使用類似的指示和。The value pushed on the stack is already aligned correctly for use with instructions like and . 結果是暫時性的指標 (型別`*`)。The result is a transient pointer (type `*`). 下列方法多載可以使用`ldloca`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldloca` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit (OpCode，short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

span.span: Pushes a null reference (type ) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |1414|ldnullldnull|推送至堆疊的 null 參考push a null reference onto the stack| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. Null 物件參考推送至堆疊。A null object reference is pushed onto the stack. `ldnull` 推送 null 參考 (型別`O`) 堆疊上。`ldnull` pushes a null reference (type `O`) on the stack. 這用來初始化位置，它們會填入資料之前，或當它們變成已被取代。This is used to initialize locations before they are populated with data, or when they become deprecated. `ldnull` 提供與大小無關的 null 參考。`ldnull` provides a null reference that is size-independent. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldnull`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldnull` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldobj
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldobj As OpCode

summary.span: 複製位址所指向的實值類型物件到評估堆疊的頂端。

span.span: Copies the value type object pointed to by an address to the top of the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |71 < `T` >71 < `T` >|ldobj `class`ldobj `class`|複製實值型別執行個體`class`堆疊。Copy instance of value type `class` to the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 實值型別物件的位址推送至堆疊。The address of a value type object is pushed onto the stack. 2. 位址從堆疊推出，並在該特定位址的執行個體則會查閱。The address is popped from the stack and the instance at that particular address is looked up. 3. 儲存在該位址之物件的值推入至堆疊。The value of the object stored at that address is pushed onto the stack. `ldobj`指令用來做為參數傳遞實值類型。The `ldobj` instruction is used to pass a value type as a parameter. `ldobj`指令會將複製所指向的值`addrOfValObj`(型別的`&`， `*`，或`native int`) 至堆疊的頂端。The `ldobj` instruction copies the value pointed to by `addrOfValObj` (of type `&`, `*`, or `native int`) to the top of the stack. 複製的位元組數目取決於類別的大小 (依指定`class`參數)。The number of bytes copied depends on the size of the class (as specified by the `class` parameter). `class`參數是代表實值型別中繼資料語彙基元。The `class` parameter is a metadata token representing the value type. 營運`ldobj`可以改變指示錯誤的前或前置詞指令。The operation of the `ldobj` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果找不到類別，會擲回。 is thrown if class cannot be found. 這通常是偵測到的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。This is typically detected when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code rather than at runtime. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldobj`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldsfld
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldsfld As OpCode

summary.span: 推送靜態欄位的值至評估堆疊。

span.span: Pushes the value of a static field onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7E < `T` >7E < `T` >|ldsfld `field`ldsfld `field`|推播的值`field`堆疊上。Push the value of `field` on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 特定欄位的值推入至堆疊。The value of the specific field is pushed onto the stack. `ldsfld`指令會推入靜態 （在類別的所有執行個體之間共用） 的值在堆疊上的欄位。The `ldsfld` instruction pushes the value of a static (shared among all instances of a class) field on the stack. 傳遞的中繼資料語彙基元相關聯的傳回型別是`field`。The return type is that associated with the passed metadata token `field`. `ldsfld`指令可以有前置詞。The `ldsfld` instruction can have a prefix. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldsfld`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldsfld` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldsflda
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldsflda As OpCode

summary.span: 推送靜態欄位的位址至評估堆疊。

span.span: Pushes the address of a static field onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7F < `T` >7F < `T` >|ldsflda `field`ldsflda `field`|推播的位址`field`堆疊上Push the address of `field` on the stack| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 特定欄位的位址推送至堆疊。The address of a specific field is pushed onto the stack. `ldsflda`指令會推入靜態 （在類別的所有執行個體之間共用） 的位址欄位在堆疊上。The `ldsflda` instruction pushes the address of a static (shared among all instances of a class) field on the stack. 位址可表示為暫時性指標 (型別`*`) 如果中繼資料語彙基元`field`參考型別，其記憶體進行管理。The address may be represented as a transient pointer (type `*`) if the metadata token `field` refers to a type whose memory is managed. 否則，它會對應至的 unmanaged 指標 (型別`native int`)。Otherwise, it corresponds to an unmanaged pointer (type `native int`). 請注意，`field`可能是靜態全域具有相對虛擬位址 （其包含的 PE 檔案載入到記憶體的基底地址中的欄位位移） 的記憶體是未受管理的位置。Note that `field` may be a static global with an assigned relative virtual address (the offset of the field from the base address at which its containing PE file is loaded into memory) where the memory is unmanaged. `ldsflda`指令可以有前置詞。The `ldsflda` instruction can have a prefix. 如果在中繼資料中找不到欄位，會擲回。 is thrown if field is not found in the metadata. 這通常會檢查 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換成原生程式碼，不在執行階段時。This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at runtime. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldsflda`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldsflda` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldstr
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldstr As OpCode

summary.span: 推送新的物件參考至儲存於中繼資料的字串常值 (String Literal)。

span.span: Pushes a new object reference to a string literal stored in the metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |72 < `T` >72 < `T` >|ldstr `mdToken`ldstr `mdToken`|將中繼資料字串語彙基元的字串物件推入`mdToken`。Pushes a string object for the metadata string token `mdToken`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 字串的物件參考推送至堆疊。An object reference to a string is pushed onto the stack. `ldstr`指令會推入的物件參考 (型別`O`) 至新的字串物件，表示特定字串常值儲存在中繼資料。The `ldstr` instruction pushes an object reference (type `O`) to a new string object representing the specific string literal stored in the metadata. `ldstr`指令會配置必要的記憶體數量，並執行任何轉換的字串常值字串所需的格式在執行階段檔案中所使用的形式所需的格式轉換。The `ldstr` instruction allocates the requisite amount of memory and performs any format conversion required to convert the string literal from the form used in the file to the string format required at runtime. Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) 可確保兩個結果`ldstr`指示參考兩個具有相同的字元序列的中繼資料語彙基元傳回精確的相同字串物件 （稱為 「 字串暫留 」 的程序）。The Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) guarantees that the result of two `ldstr` instructions referring to two metadata tokens that have the same sequence of characters return precisely the same string object (a process known as "string interning"). 下列方法多載可以使用`ldstr`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldstr` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit (OpCode 字串)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, string)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldtoken
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldtoken As OpCode

summary.span: 將中繼資料語彙基元轉換成它的執行階段表示，並將它推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation, pushing it onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D0 < `T` >D0 < `T` >|ldtoken `token`ldtoken `token`|將中繼資料語彙基元轉換成它的執行階段表示。Converts a metadata token to its runtime representation.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 傳入的語彙基元轉換成`RuntimeHandle`並推送至堆疊。The passed token is converted to a `RuntimeHandle` and pushed onto the stack. `ldtoken`指示推播`RuntimeHandle`針對指定的中繼資料語彙基元。The `ldtoken` instruction pushes a `RuntimeHandle` for the specified metadata token. A`RuntimeHandle`可以是`fieldref/fielddef`，則`methodref/methoddef`，或`typeref/typedef`。A `RuntimeHandle` can be a `fieldref/fielddef`, a `methodref/methoddef`, or a `typeref/typedef`. 推送到堆疊上的值可用於呼叫`Reflection`系統類別庫中的方法。The value pushed on the stack can be used in calls to `Reflection` methods in the system class library. 在執行階段控制代碼上的資訊，請參閱下列類別： ， ，和。For information on runtime handles, see the following classes: , , and . 下列方法多載可以使用`ldtoken`opcode:The following method overloads can use the `ldtoken` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo) - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo) - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ldvirtftn
Public Shared ReadOnly Ldvirtftn As OpCode

summary.span: 推入實作與指定的物件相關聯的特定虛擬方法之機器碼的 Unmanaged 指標 (型別 ) 至評估堆疊。

span.span: Pushes an unmanaged pointer (type ) to the native code implementing a particular virtual method associated with a specified object onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 07 < `T` >FE 07 < `T` >|v `method`ldvirtftn `method`|將滑鼠指標物件的虛擬方法推入`method`堆疊上。Pushes the pointer to an object's virtual method `method` on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考推送至堆疊。An object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 物件參考會從堆疊和進入點位址推出方法 (指定中繼資料語彙基元`method`) 查閱。The object reference is popped from the stack and the address of the entry point to the method (as specified by the metadata token `method`) is looked up. 3. 將指標`method`推送至堆疊。The pointer to `method` is pushed onto the stack. 產生的 unmanaged 的指標推入堆疊所`ldvirtftn`指令可以用來呼叫看它所參考的 managed 的方法 （或從 managed 轉換到 unmanaged 程式碼 stub） 的指示。The resulting unmanaged pointer pushed onto the stack by the `ldvirtftn` instruction can be called using the instruction if it references a managed method (or a stub that transitions from managed to unmanaged code). Unmanaged 的指標會指向使用 CLR 的呼叫慣例的原生程式碼。The unmanaged pointer points to native code using the CLR calling convention. 這個方法的指標不應該傳遞至未受管理的原生程式碼中，但會做為回呼常式。This method pointer should not be passed to unmanaged native code as a callback routine. 下列方法多載可以使用`ldvirtftn`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ldvirtftn` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 MethodInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, MethodInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Leave
Public Shared ReadOnly Leave As OpCode

summary.span: 結束程式碼的保護區，無條件地將控制權傳輸至特定的目標指令。

span.span: Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a specific target instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DD < `int32` >DD < `int32` >|保留 `target`leave `target`|結束程式碼的受保護的區域。Exits a protected region of code.| 不沒有指定這個指示任何堆疊轉換行為。There is no stack transition behavior specified for this instruction. `leave`指令無條件地將控制權傳輸至特定目標的指示，以 4 位元組帶正負號的位移，從開頭緊跟在目前的指令。The `leave` instruction unconditionally transfers control to the specific target instruction, represented as a 4-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. `leave`指示大致`br`的指示，但它可以用來結束`try`， `filter`，或`catch`封鎖而一般的分支指令可以只能在這類區塊內的控制權轉移它。The `leave` instruction is similar to the `br` instruction, but it can be used to exit a `try`, `filter`, or `catch` block whereas the ordinary branch instructions can only be used in such a block to transfer control within it. `leave`指令會清空評估堆疊，並確保適當的周圍`finally`區塊會執行。The `leave` instruction empties the evaluation stack and ensures that the appropriate surrounding `finally` blocks are executed. 您無法使用`leave`結束指令`finally`區塊。You cannot use a `leave` instruction to exit a `finally` block. 為了簡化程式碼產生作業是使用在 catch 區塊內有效的例外狀況處理常式`leave`指令，以便將控制權移轉給中相關聯的任何指令`try`區塊。To ease code generation for exception handlers it is valid from within a catch block to use a `leave` instruction to transfer control to any instruction within the associated `try` block. 指令會有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送至第一個一個前置詞。If an instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 下列方法多載可以使用`leave`opcode:The following method overloads can use the `leave` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Leave_S
Public Shared ReadOnly Leave_S As OpCode

summary.span: 結束程式碼的保護區，無條件地將控制權傳輸至目標指令 (簡短形式)。

span.span: Exits a protected region of code, unconditionally transferring control to a target instruction (short form).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DE < `int8` >DE < `int8` >|leave.s `target`leave.s `target`|結束程式碼中，簡短形式的保護的區。Exit a protected region of code, short form.| 不沒有指定這個指示任何堆疊轉換行為。There is no stack transition behavior specified for this instruction. `leave.s`指令無條件地將控制權傳輸至傳遞的目標的指示，以 1 位元帶正負號的位移，從開頭緊跟在目前的指令。The `leave.s` instruction unconditionally transfers control to the passed target instruction, represented as a 1-byte signed offset from the beginning of the instruction following the current instruction. `leave.s`指示大致`br`的指示，但它可以用來結束`try`， `filter`，或`catch`封鎖而一般的分支指令可以只能在這類區塊內的控制權轉移它。The `leave.s` instruction is similar to the `br` instruction, but it can be used to exit a `try`, `filter`, or `catch` block whereas the ordinary branch instructions can only be used in such a block to transfer control within it. `leave.s`指令會清空評估堆疊，並確保適當的周圍`finally`區塊會執行。The `leave.s` instruction empties the evaluation stack and ensures that the appropriate surrounding `finally` blocks are executed. 您無法使用`leave.s`結束指令`finally`區塊。You cannot use a `leave.s` instruction to exit a `finally` block. 為了簡化程式碼產生作業是使用在 catch 區塊內有效的例外狀況處理常式`leave.s`指令，以便將控制權移轉給中相關聯的任何指令`try`區塊。To ease code generation for exception handlers it is valid from within a catch block to use a `leave.s` instruction to transfer control to any instruction within the associated `try` block. 指令會有一或多個前置詞程式碼，如果控制項只傳送至第一個一個前置詞。If an instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 下列方法多載可以使用`leave.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `leave.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Localloc
Public Shared ReadOnly Localloc As OpCode

summary.span: 從區域動態記憶體集區中配置某些數量的位元組，並將第一個配置的位元組的位址 (暫時性指標，型別 ) 推入至評估堆疊。

span.span: Allocates a certain number of bytes from the local dynamic memory pool and pushes the address (a transient pointer, type ) of the first allocated byte onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0FFE 0F|localloclocalloc|從本機堆積中配置空間。Allocate space from the local heap.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 要配置的位元組數目會推送至堆疊。The number of bytes to be allocated is pushed onto the stack. 2. 從堆疊; 彈出的位元組數目，本機堆積中配置的大小所對應的記憶體數量。The number of bytes is popped from the stack; an amount of memory corresponding to the size is allocated from the local heap. 3. 配置的記憶體中的第一個位元組的指標會推送至堆疊。A pointer to the first byte of the allocated memory is pushed onto the stack. `localloc`指令會配置`size`(型別`natural unsigned int`) 個位元組，從區域動態記憶體集區，並將位址傳回 (暫時性指標，類型`*`) 的第一個配置的位元組。The `localloc` instruction allocates `size` (type `natural unsigned int`) bytes from the local dynamic memory pool and returns the address (a transient pointer, type `*`) of the first allocated byte. 方法上的初始化旗標才會初始化為 0 的記憶體區塊傳回`true`。The block of memory returned is initialized to 0 only if the initialize flag on the method is `true`. 當目前的方法執行，本機記憶體集區將可重複使用。When the current method executes a , the local memory pool is made available for reuse. 產生的位址，讓任何基本資料型別可以儲存在該處使用對齊`stind`指示 (例如) 並載入使用`ldind`指示 (例如)。The resulting address is aligned so that any primitive data type can be stored there using the `stind` instructions (such as ) and loaded using the `ldind` instructions (such as ). `localloc`指令不能出現在`filter`， `catch`， `finally`，或`fault`區塊。The `localloc` instruction cannot occur within a `filter`, `catch`, `finally`, or `fault` block. 如果沒有記憶體不足，無法服務要求，會擲回。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to service the request. 下列方法多載可以使用`localloc`opcode:The following method overload can use the `localloc` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Mkrefany
Public Shared ReadOnly Mkrefany As OpCode

summary.span: 將特定類型的執行個體之類型參考推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Pushes a typed reference to an instance of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |C6 < `T` >C6 < `T` >|mkrefany `class`mkrefany `class`|類型的類型的參考推送`class`至堆疊。Pushes a typed reference of type `class` onto the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 指標的資料推送至堆疊。A pointer to piece of data is pushed onto the stack. 2. 指標是快顯，轉換成具類型的參考型別的`class`。The pointer is popped and converted to a typed reference of type `class`. 3. 具類型的參考推送至堆疊。The typed reference is pushed onto the stack. `mkrefany`指示支援的動態類型的參考傳遞。The `mkrefany` instruction supports the passing of dynamically typed references. 類型必須是指標`&`， `*`，或`native int`，並保留一段資料的有效位址。The pointer must be of type `&`, `*`, or `native int`, and hold the valid address of a piece of data. `Class` 類別的語彙基元所描述指標所參考的資料的類型。`Class` is the class token describing the type of the data referenced by the pointer. `Mkrefany` 在堆疊上，提供不透明的描述元的指標和類型的類型的參考推送`class`。`Mkrefany` pushes a typed reference on the stack, providing an opaque descriptor of the pointer and the type `class`. 唯一有效的作業允許的型別參考時，就是將它傳遞至要求做為參數的型別的參考的方法。The only valid operation permitted upon a typed reference is to pass it to a method that requires a typed reference as a parameter. 被呼叫者接著可以使用和分別擷取的型別 （類別） 與位址的指示。The callee can then use the and instructions to retrieve the type (class) and the address respectively. 如果擲回`class`找不到。 is thrown if `class` cannot be found. 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at runtime. 下列方法多載可以使用`mkrefany`opcode:The following method overload can use the `mkrefany` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

summary.span: 將兩個值相乘，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Multiplies two values and pushes the result on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5A5A|mulmul|將在堆疊上的兩個值相乘。Multiplies two values on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value1`乘以`value2`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `mul`指示乘以`value1`由`value2`並將結果推至堆疊上。The `mul` instruction multiplies `value1` by `value2` and pushes the result on the stack. 整數運算溢位截斷發生溢位較高的位元。Integer operations silently truncate the upper bits on overflow. 請參閱整數特定乘法運算溢位處理的作業。See for an integer-specific multiply operation with overflow handling. 浮點類型，0 \* 無限大 = NaN。For floating-point types, 0 \* infinity = NaN. 下列方法多載可以使用`mul`opcode:The following method overload can use the `mul` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Mul_Ovf As OpCode

summary.span: 將兩個整數值相乘、執行溢位檢查，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Multiplies two integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D8D8|mul.ovfmul.ovf|將具有溢位檢查的堆疊上的兩個整數值相乘。Multiplies two integer values on the stack with an overflow check.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value1`乘以`value2`，具有溢位檢查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`, with an overflow check. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `mul.ovf`指示乘以整數`value1`整數`value2`並將結果推至堆疊上。The `mul.ovf` instruction multiplies integer `value1` by integer `value2` and pushes the result on the stack. 如果結果無法納入結果類型，則會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if the result will not fit in the result type. 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 下列方法多載可以使用`mul.ovf`opcode:The following method overload can use the `mul.ovf` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 將兩個不帶正負號的整數值相乘、執行溢位檢查，再將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Multiplies two unsigned integer values, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |D9D9|mul.ovf.unmul.ovf.un|將具有溢位檢查的堆疊上的兩個不帶正負號的值相乘。Multiplies two unsigned values on the stack with an overflow check.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value1`乘以`value2`，具有溢位檢查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value1` is multiplied by `value2`, with an overflow check. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `mul.ovf.un`指示乘以不帶正負號的整數`value1`不帶正負號的整數`value2`並將結果推至堆疊上。The `mul.ovf.un` instruction multiplies unsigned integer `value1` by unsigned integer `value2` and pushes the result on the stack. 如果結果無法納入結果類型，則會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown if the result will not fit in the result type. 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 下列方法多載可以使用`mul.ovf.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `mul.ovf.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 將值變成相反值，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Negates a value and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6565|negneg|目前在堆疊頂端值的否定運算。Negates the value currently on top of the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 值是從堆疊推出，否定。A value is popped from the stack and negated. 3. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `neg`指令執行值的否定運算，並將結果的堆疊的頂端。The `neg` instruction negates value and pushes the result on top of the stack. 傳回類型是運算元類型相同。The return type is the same as the operand type. 整數值的否定是標準二補數否定。Negation of integral values is standard two's complement negation. 特別是，否定最大負數的數字 （但不需要正的對應項目） 會產生最大負數的數字。In particular, negating the most negative number (which does not have a positive counterpart) yields the most negative number. 若要偵測此溢位，請使用指令改為 （也就是減去 0）。To detect this overflow use the instruction instead (that is, subtract from 0). 將浮點數值不能溢位，並取消 NaN 會傳回 NaN。Negating a floating-point number cannot overflow, and negating NaN returns NaN. 下列方法多載可以使用`neg`opcode:The following method overload can use the `neg` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Newarr
Public Shared ReadOnly Newarr As OpCode

summary.span: 將新的以零為起始一維陣列 (其項目屬於特定類型) 的物件參考推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Pushes an object reference to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of a specific type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |8D < `T` >8D < `T` >|newarr `etype`newarr `etype`|建立新的陣列類型的項目`etype`。Creates a new array with elements of type `etype`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 陣列中的項目數會推送至堆疊。The number of elements in the array is pushed onto the stack. 2. 項目數會從堆疊推出，並在建立陣列。The number of elements is popped from the stack and the array is created. 3. 新陣列的物件參考推送至堆疊。An object reference to the new array is pushed onto the stack. `newarr`指令會推入的物件參考 (型別`O`) 以其元素為型別的新之以零起始的一維陣列`etype`（中繼資料語彙基元來描述型別）。The `newarr` instruction pushes an object reference (type `O`) to a new zero-based, one-dimensional array whose elements are of type `etype` (a metadata token describing the type). 新陣列中的項目數應指定為`native int`。The number of elements in the new array should be specified as a `native int`. 陣列的有效索引範圍從零到最大項目數減一。Valid array indexes range from zero to the maximum number of elements minus one. 陣列的項目可以是任何類型，包括實值型別。The elements of an array can be any type, including value types. 會使用參考適當的值類型的中繼資料語彙基元 」 來建立 「 數字的以零為起始的一維陣列 (等等)。Zero-based, one-dimensional arrays of numbers are created using a metadata token referencing the appropriate value type (, and so on). 陣列的元素會初始化為 0 或適當的型別。Elements of the array are initialized to 0 of the appropriate type. Nonzero-基礎的一維陣列和多維度陣列使用建立而非`newarr`。Nonzero-based one-dimensional arrays and multidimensional arrays are created using rather than `newarr`. 通常，在建立使用的方法.NET Framework 中的類別。More commonly, they are created using the methods of the class in the .NET Framework. 如果沒有記憶體不足，無法滿足要求，會擲回。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. 如果擲回`numElems`小於 0。 is thrown if `numElems` is less than 0. 下列方法多載可以使用`newarr`opcode:The following method overload can use the `newarr` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Newobj
Public Shared ReadOnly Newobj As OpCode

summary.span: 建立實值型別的新物件或新執行個體，將物件參考 (型別 ) 推入至評估堆疊。

span.span: Creates a new object or a new instance of a value type, pushing an object reference (type ) onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |73 < `T` >73 < `T` >|newobj `ctor`newobj `ctor`|配置未初始化的物件或實值類型，並呼叫建構函式方法`ctor`。Allocates an uninitialized object or value type and calls the constructor method `ctor`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 引數`arg1`透過`argn`序列中推送到堆疊上。Arguments `arg1` through `argn` are pushed on the stack in sequence. 2. 引數`argn`經由`arg1`會從堆疊推出，並傳遞至`ctor`建立物件。Arguments `argn` through `arg1` are popped from the stack and passed to `ctor` for object creation. 3. 新的物件參考推送至堆疊。A reference to the new object is pushed onto the stack. `newobj`指示會建立新的物件或實值類型的新執行個體。The `newobj` instruction creates a new object or a new instance of a value type. `Ctor` 為中繼資料語彙基元 (`methodref`或`methoddef`，必須標示為建構函式)，表示名稱、 類別和建構函式呼叫的簽章。`Ctor` is a metadata token (a `methodref` or `methoddef` that must be marked as a constructor) that indicates the name, class and signature of the constructor to call. `newobj`指令會配置與相關聯類別的新執行個體`ctor`並初始化 0 （或適當的型別） 或 null 參考為適當的新執行個體中的所有欄位。The `newobj` instruction allocates a new instance of the class associated with `ctor` and initializes all the fields in the new instance to 0 (of the proper type) or null references as appropriate. 然後它會呼叫建構函式`ctor`與指定的引數，以及新建立的執行個體。It then calls the constructor `ctor` with the given arguments along with the newly created instance. 在呼叫建構函式之後，現在會初始化物件參考 (型別`O`) 推送到堆疊上。After the constructor has been called, the now initialized object reference (type `O`) is pushed on the stack. 從建構函式的觀點來看，未初始化的物件是引數 0，而其他引數傳遞至 newobj 順序。From the constructor's point of view, the uninitialized object is argument 0 and the other arguments passed to newobj follow in order. 使用建立所有的以零為起始的一維陣列，而非`newobj`。All zero-based, one-dimensional arrays are created using , not `newobj`. 相反地，所有其他陣列 （一個維度，或是一維但不是以零為起始） 會建立使用`newobj`。On the other hand, all other arrays (more than one dimension, or one-dimensional but not zero-based) are created using `newobj`. 實值型別不通常會建立使用`newobj`。Value types are not usually created using `newobj`. 通常會配置做為引數或區域變數，使用`newarr`（適用於以零為起始的一維陣列），或做為欄位的物件。They are usually allocated either as arguments or local variables, using `newarr` (for zero-based, one-dimensional arrays), or as fields of objects. 配置之後，它們會初始化使用。Once allocated, they are initialized using . 不過，`newobj`指令可以用來建立實值類型的新執行個體上的堆疊，然後當做引數，儲存在區域變數中等等。However, the `newobj` instruction can be used to create a new instance of a value type on the stack, that can then be passed as an argument, stored in a local, and so on. 如果沒有記憶體不足，無法滿足要求，會擲回。 is thrown if there is insufficient memory to satisfy the request. 如果建構函式方法會擲回`ctor`使用指定的名稱、 類別和簽章找不到。 is thrown if a constructor method `ctor` with the indicated name, class and signature could not be found. 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime. 下列方法多載可以使用`newobj`opcode:The following method overload can use the `newobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 ConstructorInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, ConstructorInfo)

Public Shared ReadOnly Nop As OpCode

summary.span: 如果已完成修補作業碼，則填滿空間。

span.span: Fills space if opcodes are patched.

summary.span: 雖然會耗用處理循環，卻不會執行任何有意義的運算。

span.span: No meaningful operation is performed although a processing cycle can be consumed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0000|nopnop|執行作業而不需要的行為。Performs an operation without behavior.| 定義這個指示沒有堆疊轉換行為。There is no stack transitional behavior defined for this instruction. `nop`作業不執行任何動作。The `nop` operation does nothing. 它被用來填滿空間中，如果修補作業碼。It is intended to fill in space if opcodes are patched. 下列方法多載可以使用`nop`opcode:The following method overload can use the `nop` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Not
Public Shared ReadOnly Not As OpCode

summary.span: 計算堆疊頂端的整數值的位元補數 (Complement)，並將結果當做相同類型來推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Computes the bitwise complement of the integer value on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack as the same type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6666|notnot|計算值的位元補數。Computes the bitwise complement of a value.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value` 推送至堆疊。`value` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value` 會從堆疊和其位元推出計算的補數。`value` is popped from the stack and its bitwise complement computed. 3. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `not`指令會計算整數值的位元補數，並推送至堆疊的結果。The `not` instruction computes the bitwise complement of an integer value and pushes the result onto the stack. 傳回類型是運算元類型相同。The return type is the same as the operand type. 下列方法多載可以使用`not`opcode:The following method overload can use the `not` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Or
Public Shared ReadOnly Or As OpCode

summary.span: 計算堆疊頂端兩個整數值的位元補數，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Compute the bitwise complement of the two integer values on top of the stack and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6060|或or|計算位元，或兩個整數值，傳回一個整數。Computes the bitwise OR of two integer values, returns an integer.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊和其位元 OR 運算計算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and their bitwise OR computed. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `or`指令會計算位於堆疊中，頂端的兩個值的位元 OR，推送到堆疊上的結果。The `or` instruction computes the bitwise OR of two values atop the stack, pushing the result onto the stack. `Or` 是整數特定作業。`Or` is an integer-specific operation. 下列方法多載可以使用`or`opcode:The following method overload can use the `or` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Pop
Public Shared ReadOnly Pop As OpCode

summary.span: 目前在評估堆疊頂端移除值。

span.span: Removes the value currently on top of the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2626|poppop|從最高的值從堆疊中取出。Pops the top value from the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 最高的值是從堆疊取出。The top value is popped from the stack. `pop`指令從堆疊移除最上層的項目。The `pop` instruction removes the top element from the stack. 下列方法多載可以使用`pop`opcode:The following method overload can use the `pop` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
