summary.span: 指定後續陣列位址作業在執行階段不執行任何類型檢查，且會傳回限制其變動性的 Managed 指標。

span.span: Specifies that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer whose mutability is restricted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1EFE 1E|readonly。readonly.|指定後續陣列位址作業會執行任何型別檢查，在執行階段，以及它與受限制的可變動性，傳回的 managed 的指標。Specify that the subsequent array address operation performs no type check at run time, and that it returns a managed pointer with restricted mutability.| 此前置詞只能出現正前面`ldelema`指令和呼叫特殊`Address`陣列上的方法。This prefix can only appear immediately preceding the `ldelema` instruction and calls to the special `Address` method on arrays. 其會影響後續的作業有兩個：Its effect on the subsequent operation is twofold: 1. 在執行階段類型檢查會不執行任何作業。At run time, no type check operation is performed. 請注意，正常的隱含型別檢查`ldelema`和`stelem`指示在參考上使用時輸入陣列。Note that there is normally an implicit type check for the `ldelema` and `stelem` instructions when used on reference type arrays. 都不會實值類別的執行階段類型檢查因此`readonly`在此情況下會執行任何作業。There is never a run-time type check for value classes, so `readonly` is a no-op in that case. 2. 驗證器視為的 managed 指標與受限制的可變動性的地址的作業結果。The verifier treats the result of the address-of operation as a managed pointer with restricted mutability. 指標則稱為已限制可變動性，因為定義的型別可讓您控制是否可以變更值。The pointer is said to have restricted mutability because the defining type controls whether the value can be mutated. 公開 （expose） 沒有公用欄位或更新進行中的值的方法的實值類別，指標是唯讀的 (因此前置詞的名稱)。For value classes that expose no public fields or methods that update the value in place, the pointer is read-only (hence the name of the prefix). 特別的是，表示基本類型 (例如 System.Int32) 的類別不會公開 mutator，並因此處於唯讀狀態。In particular, the classes representing primitive types (for example, System.Int32) do not expose mutators and thus are read-only. 這種方式在受限制的 managed 的指標只能用於透過下列方式：A managed pointer restricted in this fashion can be used only in the following ways: - 作為`object`參數`ldfld`， `ldflda`， `stfld`， `call`，或`constrained callvirt`指示。As the `object` parameter for the `ldfld`, `ldflda`, `stfld`, `call`, or`constrained callvirt` instructions. - 作為`pointer`參數來`ldobj`指示或其中一個`ldind`指示。As the `pointer` parameter to the `ldobj` instruction or to one of the `ldind` instructions. - 作為`source`參數來`cpobj`指令。As the `source` parameter to the `cpobj` instruction. 所有其他作業，包括`stobj`， `initobj`，或`mkrefany`作業，或任何`stind`指示。All other operations disallowed, including the `stobj`, `initobj`, or `mkrefany` operations, or any of the `stind` instructions. 目的`readonly`前置詞是以擷取從泛型程式碼中陣列的項目時，避免類型檢查。The purpose of the `readonly` prefix is to avoid a type check when fetching an element from an array in generic code. 例如，運算式`arr[i].m()`，其中的項目類型的陣列`arr`限定於都有一個介面以方法為泛型型別`m`，可能會編譯為下列的 MSIL。For example, the expression `arr[i].m()`, where the element type of the array `arr` is a generic type that has been constrained to have an interface with method `m`, might compile to the following MSIL. ``` ldloc arr ldloc i readonly. ldelema !0 // Loads the pointer to the object. … // Load the arguments to the call. constrained. !0 callvirt m ``` 不含`readonly`前置詞，`ldelema`指令會執行類型檢查，萬一其中 ！ 0 是參考型別。Without the `readonly` prefix, the `ldelema` instruction would perform a type check in the case where !0 was a reference type. 不只是這個型別檢查效率不佳，但語意不正確。Not only is this type check inefficient, but it is semantically incorrect. 型別檢查`ldelema`完全相符，也就是太強式。The type check for `ldelema` is an exact match, which is too strong. 如果陣列類型的子類別 ！ 0，上述程式碼將會失敗類型檢查。If the array held subclasses of type !0, the code above would fail the type check. 陣列元素的位址會擷取，而不是項目本身，才會有的控制代碼`arr[i]`適用於同時實值類型和參考型別，並因此可以傳遞至`constrained callvirt`指令。The address of the array element is fetched, instead of the element itself, in order to have a handle for `arr[i]` that works for both value types and reference types, and thus can be passed to the `constrained callvirt` instruction. 一般情況下會略過執行階段檢查，如果陣列是參考類型的項目不安全。In general it would be unsafe to skip the run-time check if the array held elements of a reference type. 為了安全起見，就必須確保對陣列進行任何修改都會經過這個指標。To be safe, it is necessary to ensure that no modifications to the array are made through this pointer. 驗證器規則，請確定這。The verifier rules ensure this. 受限制的 managed 的指標可以傳遞做為物件的執行個體方法呼叫，因此它不是嚴格來說唯讀的實值型別，但是是實值型別沒有型別安全問題。The restricted managed pointer can be passed as the object of instance method calls, so it is not strictly speaking read-only for value types, but there is no type safety problem for value types. 下列方法多載可以使用`readonly`opcode:The following method overload can use the `readonly` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Refanytype
Public Shared ReadOnly Refanytype As OpCode

summary.span: 擷取內嵌於類型參考中的類型語彙基元。

span.span: Retrieves the type token embedded in a typed reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1DFE 1D|refanytyperefanytype|將推送儲存在具類型的參考型別語彙基元。Pushes the type token stored in a typed reference.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 實值類型參考推送至堆疊。A value type reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 具類型的參考會從堆疊推出，並擷取其對應的型別語彙基元。The typed reference is popped from the stack and its corresponding type token retrieved. 3. 型別語彙基元會推送至堆疊。The type token is pushed onto the stack. 具類型的參考包含型別語彙基元和物件執行個體的位址。A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance. `refanytype`指令擷取內嵌於型別參考中的型別語彙基元。The `refanytype` instruction retrieves the type token embedded in the typed reference. 請參閱指令，如需建立資訊型別參考。See the instruction for information on creating typed references. 下列方法多載可以使用`refanytype`opcode:The following method overload can use the `refanytype` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Refanyval
Public Shared ReadOnly Refanyval As OpCode

summary.span: 擷取內嵌於型別參考中的位址 (型別 )。

span.span: Retrieves the address (type ) embedded in a typed reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |C2 < `T` >C2 < `T` >|refanyval `type`refanyval `type`|將推送儲存在具類型參考的位址。Pushes the address stored in a typed reference.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 實值類型參考推送至堆疊。A value type reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 具類型的參考會從堆疊推出，擷取對應的位址。The typed reference is popped from the stack and the corresponding address retrieved. 3. 地址推送至堆疊。The address is pushed onto the stack. 具類型的參考包含型別語彙基元和物件執行個體的位址。A typed reference contains a type token and an address to an object instance. `refanyval`指令會擷取內嵌於位址的型別的參考。The `refanyval` instruction retrieves the address embedded in the a typed reference. 內嵌在堆疊上提供的型別參考的型別必須符合所指定的型別`type`(中繼資料語彙基元，請`typedef`或`typeref`)。The type embedded in the typed reference supplied on the stack must match the type specified by `type` (a metadata token, either a `typedef` or a `typeref`). 請參閱相關內容的指示。See the instruction for related content. 如果擲回`type`不等於儲存在型別參考的型別 (在此情況下，`type`類別提供給建構的指示所說的具類型的參考)。 is thrown if `type` is not identical to the type stored in the type reference (in this case, `type` is the class supplied to the instruction that constructed said typed reference). 如果擲回`type`找不到。 is thrown if `type` cannot be found. 下列方法多載可以使用`refanyval`opcode:The following method overload can use the `refanyval` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Rem
Public Shared ReadOnly Rem As OpCode

summary.span: 將兩個值相除，並將餘數推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Divides two values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5D5D|remrem|將餘數推送`value1`由`value2`至堆疊。Pushes the remainder of dividing `value1` by `value2` onto the stack.| > [!NOTE] > ReplaceThisTextReplaceThisText 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. A`value1`推送至堆疊。A `value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`與在堆疊的其餘部分會彈出`value1` `div` `value2`計算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1` `rem` `value2` 符合下列條件：`result` = `value1` `rem` `value2` satisfies the following conditions: `result` = `value1` - `value2` `×` (`value1` `div` `value2`)，以及：`result` = `value1` - `value2` `×` (`value1` `div` `value2`), and: 0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |，符號 (`result`) = 號 (`value1`)，其中`div`推向零會截斷除法指令。0 = | `result` | < | `value2` |, sign(`result`) = sign(`value1`), where `div` is the division instruction that truncates towards zero. 如果`value2`為零或`value1`是的無限大的結果為 NaN。If `value2` is zero or `value1` is infinity the result is NaN. 如果`value2`是無限大，結果就是`value1`(否定的`-infinity`)。If `value2` is infinity, the result is `value1` (negated for `-infinity`). 整數類資料的作業會擲回如果`value2`為零。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 請注意，在 Intel 平台上計算時，會擲回 (minint `rem` -1)。Note that on the Intel-based platforms an is thrown when computing (minint `rem` -1). 下列方法多載可以使用`rem`opcode:The following method overload can use the `rem` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Rem_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Rem_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 將兩個不帶正負號的值相除，並將餘數推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Divides two unsigned values and pushes the remainder onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5E5E|rem.unrem.un|將餘數推送不帶正負號`value1`的不帶正負號`value2`至堆疊。Pushes the remainder of dividing unsigned `value1` by unsigned `value2` onto the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 並`value1`與在堆疊的其餘部分會彈出`value1` `div` `value2`計算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and the remainder of `value1` `div` `value2` computed. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `result` = `value1` `rem.un` `value2` 符合下列條件：`result` = `value1` `rem.un` `value2` satisfies the following conditions: `result` = `value1` - `value2` x (`value1` `div.un` `value2`)，以及：`result` = `value1` - `value2` x(`value1` `div.un` `value2`), and: 0 = `result` < `value2`，其中`div.un`為不帶正負號的除法指令。0 = `result` < `value2`, where `div.un` is the unsigned division instruction. `rem.un`指示計算`result`並將其推送到堆疊上。The `rem.un` instruction computes `result` and pushes it on the stack. `Rem.un` 其引數視為不帶正負號的整數，而將它們視為為帶正負號的整數。`Rem.un` treats its arguments as unsigned integers, while treats them as signed integers. `Rem.un` 未指定為浮點數值。`Rem.un` is unspecified for floating-point numbers. 整數類資料的作業會擲回如果`value2`為零。Integral operations throw if `value2` is zero. 下列方法多載可以使用`rem.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `rem.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Ret
Public Shared ReadOnly Ret As OpCode

summary.span: 從目前方法傳回，將被呼叫端評估堆疊的傳回值 (如果有) 推送至呼叫端的評估堆疊。

span.span: Returns from the current method, pushing a return value (if present) from the callee's evaluation stack onto the caller's evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |2A2A|retret|從方法傳回，可能傳回值。Returns from method, possibly returning a value.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 傳回值會從被呼叫端評估堆疊推出。The return value is popped from the callee evaluation stack. 2. 步驟 1 中取得的傳回值會推入至呼叫端評估堆疊。The return value obtained in step 1 is pushed onto the caller evaluation stack. 如果傳回的值不存在，被呼叫端評估堆疊上，會傳回任何值 （沒有被呼叫端或呼叫端的方法使用 stack 轉換將行為）。If the return value is not present on the callee evaluation stack, no value is returned (no stack transition behaviors for either the callee or caller method). 類型的傳回值，如果有的話，目前的方法會決定從堆疊的頂端和複製到堆疊呼叫目前方法的方法中擷取值的型別。The type of the return value, if any, of the current method determines the type of value to be fetched from the top of the stack and copied onto the stack of the method that called the current method. 評估堆疊目前的方法必須是空的除了要傳回的值。The evaluation stack for the current method must be empty except for the value to be returned. `ret`指令不能用於 out 的控制權轉移`try`， `filter`， `catch`，或`finally`區塊。The `ret` instruction cannot be used to transfer control out of a`try`, `filter`, `catch`, or `finally` block. 內在`try`或`catch`，使用指令，目的地為`ret`之外所有封入的例外狀況區塊的指示。From within a `try` or `catch`, use the instruction with a destination of a `ret` instruction that is outside all enclosing exception blocks. 因為`filter`和`finally`區塊在邏輯上是例外狀況處理與不在其中內嵌程式碼方法的組件、 正確地產生的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示不會執行方法會傳回從`filter`或`finally`。Because the `filter` and `finally` blocks are logically part of exception handling and not the method in which their code is embedded, correctly generated Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions do not perform a method return from within a `filter` or `finally`. 下列方法多載可以使用`ret`opcode:The following method overload can use the `ret` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Rethrow
Public Shared ReadOnly Rethrow As OpCode

summary.span: 重新擲回目前的例外狀況。

span.span: Rethrows the current exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1AFE 1A|重新擲回rethrow|會重新擲回目前例外狀況Rethrows the current exception| 這個指示不定義任何堆疊轉換行為。No stack transition behavior is defined for this instruction. `rethrow`指示只允許的主體內`catch`處理常式。The `rethrow` instruction is only permitted within the body of a `catch` handler. 它會擲回相同這個處理常式所攔截的例外狀況。It throws the same exception that was caught by this handler. 下列方法多載可以使用`rethrow`opcode:The following method overload can use the `rethrow` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Shl
Public Shared ReadOnly Shl As OpCode

summary.span: 將整數值向左移 (使用零) 指定的位元數，將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Shifts an integer value to the left (in zeroes) by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6262|shlshl|將左側 （移位零） 的整數。Shifts an integer to the left (shifting in zeros).| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 要移位的位元數量會推送至堆疊。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要移位的位元數和值會彈出從堆疊;值是向左移位指定的位元數。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted left by the specified number of bits. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shl`指示移位值 (型別`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 所指定的位元數留下。The `shl` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) left by the specified number of bits. 位元數是類型的值`int32`或`native int`。The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`. 要移位的位元數字是否大於或等於所提供的值的寬度 （以位元為單位），會指定傳回的值。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shl` 在每個排班上最低的位置插入零值的位元。`Shl` inserts a zero bit in the lowest position on each shift. 下列方法多載可以使用`shl`opcode:The following method overload can use the `shl` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Shr
Public Shared ReadOnly Shr As OpCode

summary.span: 將整數值 (使用正負號) 向右移指定的位元數，將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Shifts an integer value (in sign) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6363|shrshr|整數，會向右位移 （移位正負號）。Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in sign).| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 要移位的位元數量會推送至堆疊。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要移位的位元數和值會彈出從堆疊;值是向右移位指定的位元數。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shr.un`指示移位值 (型別`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 權限所指定的位元數。The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits. 位元數是類型的值`int32`或`native int`。The number of bits is a value of type `int32` or `native int`. 要移位的位元數字是否大於或等於所提供的值的寬度 （以位元為單位），會指定傳回的值。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shr` 複寫在每個排班，保留原始值的正負號位元的高序位`result`。`Shr` replicates the high order bit on each shift, preserving the sign of the original value in the `result`. 下列方法多載可以使用`shr`opcode:The following method overload can use the `shr` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Shr_Un
Public Shared ReadOnly Shr_Un As OpCode

summary.span: 將不帶正負號的整數值 (使用零) 向右移指定的位元數，將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Shifts an unsigned integer value (in zeroes) to the right by a specified number of bits, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6464|shr.unshr.un|整數，會向右位移 （移位零）。Shifts an integer to the right (shifting in zeroes).| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 要移位的位元數量會推送至堆疊。The amount of bits to be shifted is pushed onto the stack. 3. 要移位的位元數和值會彈出從堆疊;值是向右移位指定的位元數。The number of bits to be shifted and the value are popped from the stack; the value is shifted right by the specified number of bits. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. `shr.un`指示移位值 (型別`int32`，`int64`或`native int`) 權限所指定的位元數。The `shr.un` instruction shifts the value (type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`) right by the specified number of bits. 位元數是類型的值`int32`，`int64`或`native int`。The number of bits is a value of type `int32`, `int64` or `native int`. 要移位的位元數字是否大於或等於所提供的值的寬度 （以位元為單位），會指定傳回的值。The return value is unspecified if the number of bits to be shifted is greater than or equal to the width (in bits) of the supplied value. `Shr.un` 將零位元插入每個排班的最高位置。`Shr.un` inserts a zero bit in the highest position on each shift. 下列方法多載可以使用`shr.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `shr.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Sizeof
Public Shared ReadOnly Sizeof As OpCode

summary.span: 將所提供實值類型的大小推送至評估堆疊 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Pushes the size, in bytes, of a supplied value type onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 1C < `T` >FE 1C < `T` >|sizeof `valType`sizeof `valType`|推送大小，以位元組為單位為實值型別`unsigned int32`。Push the size, in bytes, of a value type as an `unsigned int32`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 提供的值類型的大小 （以位元組為單位） (`valType`) 推送至堆疊。The size (in bytes) of the supplied value type (`valType`) is pushed onto the stack. `valType` 必須是中繼資料語彙基元 (`typeref`或`typedef`)，在指定實值型別、 參考類型或泛型類型參數。`valType` must be a metadata token (a `typeref` or `typedef`) that specifies a value type, reference type, or generic type parameter. 對於參考類型，傳回的大小會是對應的參考值的大小類型 （32 位元系統上的 4 位元組），不是參考值所參考之物件中儲存之資料的大小。For a reference type, the size returned is the size of a reference value of the corresponding type (4 bytes on 32-bit systems), not the size of the data stored in objects referred to by the reference value. 泛型類型參數僅用於型別或其定義的方法主體中。A generic type parameter can be used only in the body of the type or method that defines it. 該類型或方法具現化時，由實值類型或參考類型取代泛型類型參數。When that type or method is instantiated, the generic type parameter is replaced by a value type or reference type. 下列方法多載可以使用`sizeof`opcode:The following method overload can use the `sizeof` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Starg
Public Shared ReadOnly Starg As OpCode

summary.span: 在指定索引的引數槽中將值存放在評估堆疊的頂端。

span.span: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >FE 0B < `unsigned int16` >|starg `num`starg `num`|取出從堆疊頂端的值，並將它儲存在引數位置`num`。Pops the top value from the stack and stores it in argument slot `num`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 取出目前堆疊頂端值，並放在引數位置`num`。The value currently on top of the stack is popped and placed in argument slot `num`. `starg`指令從堆疊取出值，並將它放在引數位置`num`。The `starg` instruction pops a value from the stack and places it in argument slot `num`. 值的類型必須符合目前的方法簽章中指定的引數的類型。The type of the value must match the type of the argument, as specified in the current method's signature. 使用變數引數清單的程序`starg`指示可以僅用於初始的固定引數，不是這些簽章的變動部分。For procedures that take a variable argument list, the `starg` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. 執行成存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的引數的存放區會截斷值，從堆疊移到引數。Performing a store into arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the argument. 從原生大小的浮點數的值會捨入 (型別`F`) 相關聯的引數的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 下列方法多載可以使用`starg`opcode:The following method overload can use the `starg` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit (OpCode，short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Starg_S
Public Shared ReadOnly Starg_S As OpCode

summary.span: 在指定索引 (簡短形式) 的引數位置中將值儲存於評估堆疊的頂端。

span.span: Stores the value on top of the evaluation stack in the argument slot at a specified index, short form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |10 < `unsigned int8` >10 < `unsigned int8` >|starg.s `num`starg.s `num`|取出從堆疊頂端的值，並將它儲存在引數位置`num`，簡短形式。Pops the top value from the stack and stores it in argument slot `num`, short form.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 取出目前堆疊頂端值，並放在引數位置`num`。The value currently on top of the stack is popped and placed in argument slot `num`. `starg.s`指令從堆疊取出值，並將它放在引數位置`num`。The `starg.s` instruction pops a value from the stack and places it in argument slot `num`. 值的類型必須符合目前的方法簽章中指定的引數的類型。The type of the value must match the type of the argument, as specified in the current method's signature. `starg.s`指令可讓您提供有效的編碼方式，與前 256 個引數搭配使用。The `starg.s` instruction provides an efficient encoding for use with the first 256 arguments. 使用變數引數清單的程序`starg.s`指示可以僅用於初始的固定引數，不是這些簽章的變動部分。For procedures that take a variable argument list, the `starg.s` instruction can be used only for the initial fixed arguments, not those in the variable part of the signature. 執行成存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的引數的存放區會截斷值，從堆疊移到引數。Performing a store into arguments that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the argument. 從原生大小的浮點數的值會捨入 (型別`F`) 相關聯的引數的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 下列方法多載可以使用`starg.s`opcode:The following method overload can use the `starg.s` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode，byte）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, byte)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Stelem
Public Shared ReadOnly Stelem As OpCode

summary.span: 使用評估堆疊上的值 (其類型在指令中指定)，取代在指定之索引處的陣列項目。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack, whose type is specified in the instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A4 < `T` >A4 < `T` >|stelem `typeTok`stelem `typeTok`|取代類型的值中提供的索引處的陣列項目`typeTok`堆疊上。Replaces the array element at the supplied index with a value of type `typeTok` on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 陣列，物件參考`array`，推送到堆疊。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 索引值時，`index`中的項目`array`推送至堆疊。An index value, `index`, to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 在指令中指定之型別的值推送至堆疊。A value of the type specified in the instruction is pushed onto the stack. 4. 值，索引，而陣列參考是從推出到堆疊;值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem`指示取代的一維陣列中提供之以零起始的索引處的項目值`array`的值。The `stelem` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied zero-based index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the value. 此值有語彙基元所指定的型別`typeTok`指令中。The value has the type specified by the token `typeTok` in the instruction. 陣列也是物件，表示型別的值`O`。Arrays are objects, and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是型別`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於的繫結`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果擲回`array`未持有必要的型別項目。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 下列方法多載可以使用`stelem`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stelem` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Stelem_I
Public Shared ReadOnly Stelem_I As OpCode

summary.span: 以在評估堆疊上的 值來取代在指定索引的陣列元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9B9B|stelem.istelem.i|在使用提供的索引陣列項目取代`native int`堆疊上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `native int` value on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 陣列，物件參考`array`，推送到堆疊。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 有效的索引中的項目`array`推送至堆疊。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 值，索引，而陣列參考是從推出到堆疊;值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.i`指令會取代項目的值`index`中的一維陣列`array`使用`native int`值推送至堆疊。The `stelem.i` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `native int` value pushed onto the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示類型的值由`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是型別`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於的繫結`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果擲回`array`未持有必要的型別項目。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 下列方法多載可以使用`stelem.i`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stelem.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9C9C|stelem.i1stelem.i1|在使用提供的索引陣列項目取代`int8`堆疊上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `int8` value on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 陣列，物件參考`array`，推送到堆疊。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 有效的索引中的項目`array`推送至堆疊。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 值，索引，而陣列參考是從推出到堆疊;值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.i1`指令會取代項目的值`index`中的一維陣列`array`使用`int8`值推送至堆疊。The `stelem.i1` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `int8` value pushed onto the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示類型的值由`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是型別`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於的繫結`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果擲回`array`未持有必要的型別項目。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 下列方法多載可以使用`stelem.i1`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stelem.i1` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 以在評估堆疊上的 值來取代在指定索引的陣列元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the value on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |9E9E|stelem.i4stelem.i4|在使用提供的索引陣列項目取代`int32`堆疊上的值。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `int32` value on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 陣列，物件參考`array`，推送到堆疊。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 有效的索引中的項目`array`推送至堆疊。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 值，索引，而陣列參考是從推出到堆疊;值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.i4`指令會取代項目的值`index`中的一維陣列`array`使用`int32`值推送至堆疊。The `stelem.i4` instruction replaces the value of the element `index` in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `int32` value pushed onto the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示類型的值由`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是型別`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於的繫結`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果擲回`array`未持有必要的型別項目。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 下列方法多載可以使用`stelem.i4`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stelem.i4` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 以在評估堆疊上的物件參考值 (型別 ) 來取代在指定索引的陣列元素。

span.span: Replaces the array element at a given index with the object ref value (type ) on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A2A2|stelem.refstelem.ref|在使用提供的索引陣列項目取代`ref`值 (類型`O`) 堆疊上。Replaces an array element at the supplied index with the `ref` value (type `O`) on the stack.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 陣列，物件參考`array`，推送到堆疊。An object reference to an array, `array`, is pushed onto the stack. 2. 有效的索引中的項目`array`推送至堆疊。A valid index to an element in `array` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 4. 值，索引，而陣列參考是從推出到堆疊;值會放入指定的索引處的陣列項目。The value, the index, and the array reference are popped from the stack; the value is put into the array element at the given index. `stelem.ref`指示取代的一維陣列中提供的索引處的項目值`array`具有`ref`(型別`O`) 推送至堆疊的值。The `stelem.ref` instruction replaces the value of the element at the supplied index in the one-dimensional array `array` with the `ref` (type `O`) value pushed onto the stack. 陣列也是物件，表示類型的值由`O`。Arrays are objects and hence represented by a value of type `O`. 索引是型別`native int`。The index is type `native int`. 請注意，`stelem.ref`隱含轉換的項目型別所提供的值`array`指派值的陣列項目之前。Note that `stelem.ref` implicitly casts the supplied value to the element type of `array` before assigning the value to the array element. 此轉換可能會失敗，即使針對已驗證的程式碼。This cast can fail, even for verified code. 因此`stelem.ref`指令可以擲回。Thus the `stelem.ref` instruction can throw . 多維陣列，以及不以零為起始的一維陣列類別提供方法。For one-dimensional arrays that aren't zero-based and for multidimensional arrays, the class provides a method. 如果擲回`array`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `array` is a null reference. 如果擲回`index`是負數，或大於的繫結`array`。 is thrown if `index` is negative, or larger than the bound of `array`. 如果擲回`array`未持有必要的型別項目。 is thrown if `array` does not hold elements of the required type. 下列方法多載可以使用`stelem.ref`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stelem.ref` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Stfld
Public Shared ReadOnly Stfld As OpCode

summary.span: 以新值取代儲存在物件參考或指標的欄位中的值。

span.span: Replaces the value stored in the field of an object reference or pointer with a new value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7D < `T` >7D < `T` >|stfld `field`stfld `field`|取代的值`field`具有新值的物件。Replaces the value of `field` of the object with a new value.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考或指標會推送至堆疊。An object reference or pointer is pushed onto the stack. 2. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 值，而且物件參考/指標會彈出從堆疊;值`field`在該物件會取代所提供的值。The value and the object reference/pointer are popped from the stack; the value of `field` in the object is replaced with the supplied value. `stfld`指示取代物件的欄位的值 (型別`O`) 或透過指標 (型別`native int`， `&`，或`*`) 具有給定值。The `stfld` instruction replaces the value of a field of an object (type `O`) or via a pointer (type `native int`, `&`, or `*`) with a given value. `Field` 是指欄位成員參考中繼資料語彙基元。`Field` is a metadata token that refers to a field member reference. `stfld`指令可以有一個或兩個前置詞和。The `stfld` instruction can have a prefix of either or both of and . 如果物件參考或指標為 null 參考，而欄位並非靜態，會擲回。 is thrown if the object reference or pointer is a null reference and the field isn't static. 如果擲回`field`中繼資料中找不到。 is thrown if `field` is not found in the metadata. 這通常會檢查 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指令被轉換成原生程式碼，不在執行階段時。This is typically checked when the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instruction is converted to native code, not at runtime. 下列方法多載可以使用`stfld`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stfld` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Stind_I
Public Shared ReadOnly Stind_I As OpCode

summary.span: 於所提供的位址儲存 型別的值。

span.span: Stores a value of type at a supplied address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DFDF|stind.istind.i|存放區`native int`值在指定的位址。Stores a `native int` value at a given address.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位址會推送至堆疊。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 值和位址快顯從堆疊;值會儲存在位址中。The value and the address are popped from the stack; the value is stored at the address. `stind.i`指示存放區`native int`值所提供的位址 (型別`native int`， `*`，或`&`)。The `stind.i` instruction stores a `native int` value at the supplied address (type `native int`, `*`, or `&`). 類型安全的作業需要`stind.i`指示用於指標的類型與一致的方式。Type safe operation requires that the `stind.i` instruction be used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 營運`stind.i`可以改變指示錯誤的前或前置詞指令。The operation of the `stind.i` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果擲回`addr`不會自然對齊的指示後置詞所隱含的引數類型。 is thrown if `addr` is not naturally aligned for the argument type implied by the instruction suffix. 下列方法多載可以使用`stind.i`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stind.i` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5555|stind.i8stind.i8|存放區`int64`值在指定的位址。Stores an `int64` value at a given address.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位址會推送至堆疊。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 3. 值和位址快顯從堆疊;值會儲存在位址中。The value and the address are popped from the stack; the value is stored at the address. `stind.i8`指示存放區`int64`值所提供的位址 (型別`native int`， `*`，或`&`)。The `stind.i8` instruction stores an `int64` value at the supplied address (type `native int`, `*`, or `&`). 類型安全的作業需要`stind.i8`指示用於指標的類型與一致的方式。Type safe operation requires that the `stind.i8` instruction be used in a manner consistent with the type of the pointer. 營運`stind.i`可以改變指示錯誤的前或前置詞指令。The operation of the `stind.i` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果擲回`addr`不會自然對齊的指示後置詞所隱含的引數類型。 is thrown if `addr` is not naturally aligned for the argument type implied by the instruction suffix. 下列方法多載可以使用`stind.i8`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stind.i8` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 從評估堆疊的頂端取出目前值，並將它存放在指定索引的區域變數清單中。

span.span: Pops the current value from the top of the evaluation stack and stores it in a the local variable list at a specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 0E < `unsigned int16` >FE 0E < `unsigned int16` >|stloc `index`stloc `index`|從堆疊取出值，並將它儲存在區域變數中`index`。Pops a value from the stack and stores it in local variable `index`.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 從堆疊取出值，並放在區域變數`index`。A value is popped off of the stack and placed in local variable `index`. `stloc`指令會取出評估堆疊頂端的值，並將它移至本機變數數目`index`，其中的本機變數是及更新版本編號為 0。The `stloc` instruction pops the top value off the evaluation stack and moves it into local variable number `index`, where local variables are numbered 0 onwards. 值的類型必須符合目前方法的本機簽章中指定本機變數的型別。The type of the value must match the type of the local variable as specified in the current method's local signature. 儲存至存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的區域變數會截斷值，從堆疊移動。Storing into locals that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the local variable. 從原生大小的浮點數的值會捨入 (型別`F`) 相關聯的引數的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 正確的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示要求`index`是有效的本機索引。Correct Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions require that `index` be a valid local index. 針對`stloc`的指示，`index`必須介於範圍 0 到 65534 （含） （具體而言，65535 無效）。For the `stloc` instruction, `index` must lie in the range 0 to 65534 inclusive (specifically, 65535 is not valid). 65535 排除在外的原因是務實： 可能的實作會使用 2 位元組的整數，來追蹤區域的索引，以及指定方法的區域變數的總數。The reason for excluding 65535 is pragmatic: likely implementations will use a 2-byte integer to track both a local's index, as well as the total number of locals for a given method. 如果 65535 的索引已經變成有效，它將需要更多的整數，用來追蹤這類方法中的區域變數的數目。If an index of 65535 had been made valid, it would require a wider integer to track the number of locals in such a method. 下列方法多載可以使用`stloc`opcode:The following method overloads can use the `stloc` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 LocalBuilder）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, LocalBuilder) - ILGenerator.Emit (OpCode，short)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, short)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |0A0A|stloc.0stloc.0|從堆疊中的值為 0 的區域變數中取出。Pops a value from the stack into local variable 0.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 從堆疊取出值，並放在索引為 0 的本機變數。A value is popped off of the stack and placed in the local variable indexed by 0. `stloc.0`指令取出評估堆疊頂端的值，並將它移至索引為 0 的區域變數。The `stloc.0` instruction pops the top value off the evaluation stack and moves it into the local variable indexed by 0. 值的類型必須符合目前方法的本機簽章中指定本機變數的型別。The type of the value must match the type of the local variable as specified in the current method's local signature. `stloc.0` 是有效的編碼方式，將值儲存在本機變數 0。`stloc.0` is an especially efficient encoding for storing values in local variable 0. 儲存至存放小於 4 個位元組的整數值的區域變數會截斷值，從堆疊移動。Storing into locals that hold an integer value smaller than 4 bytes long truncates the value as it moves from the stack to the local variable. 從原生大小的浮點數的值會捨入 (型別`F`) 相關聯的引數的大小。Floating-point values are rounded from their native size (type `F`) to the size associated with the argument. 下列方法多載可以使用`stloc.0`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stloc.0` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 從評估堆疊複製指定類型的值到所提供的記憶體位址。

span.span: Copies a value of a specified type from the evaluation stack into a supplied memory address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |81 < `T` >81 < `T` >|stobj `class`stobj `class`|儲存值的型別`class`從堆疊載入記憶體。Stores a value of type `class` from the stack into memory.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位址會推送至堆疊。An address is pushed onto the stack. 2. 類型的值型別物件`class`推送至堆疊。A value type object of type `class` is pushed onto the stack. 3. 物件和位址快顯從堆疊;實值類型物件會儲存在位址中。The object and the address are popped from the stack; the value type object is stored at the address. `stobj`指令會將實值類型物件複製到指定位址的位址 (類型的指標`native int`， `*`，或`&`)。The `stobj` instruction copies the value type object into the address specified by the address (a pointer of type `native int`, `*`, or `&`). 已複製的位元組數目取決於所表示之類別的大小`class`、 表示實值型別中繼資料語彙基元。The number of bytes copied depends on the size of the class represented by `class`, a metadata token representing a value type. 營運`stobj`可以改變指示錯誤的前或前置詞指令。The operation of the `stobj` instruction can be altered by an immediately preceding or prefix instruction. 如果找不到類別，會擲回。 is thrown if class cannot be found. 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code rather than at run time. 下列方法多載可以使用`stobj`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stobj` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

Public Shared ReadOnly Stsfld As OpCode

summary.span: 以來自評估堆疊的值取代靜態欄位的值。

span.span: Replaces the value of a static field with a value from the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |80 < `T` >80 < `T` >|這個前置 `field`stsfld `field`|中的值取代`field`與提供的值。Replaces the value in `field` with a supplied value.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 從堆疊取出值，並儲存在`field`。A value is popped from the stack and stored in `field`. `stsfld`指令會從堆疊以值取代靜態欄位的值。The `stsfld` instruction replaces the value of a static field with a value from the stack. `field` 為靜態欄位成員必須參考中繼資料語彙基元。`field` is a metadata token that must refer to a static field member. `stsfld`可能會加上指令。The `stsfld` instruction may be prefixed by . 如果在中繼資料中找不到欄位，會擲回。 is thrown if field is not found in the metadata. 這通常會檢查 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換成原生程式碼，不是在執行階段時。This is typically checked when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, not at run time. 下列方法多載可以使用`stsfld`opcode:The following method overload can use the `stsfld` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 FieldInfo）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, FieldInfo)

Public Shared ReadOnly Sub As OpCode

summary.span: 將另一個值減去某一個值，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Subtracts one value from another and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |5959|subsub|一個值減去另一個，傳回新的數值。Subtracts one value from another, returning a new numeric value.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value2`會減去`value1`。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value2` is subtracted from `value1`. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. 整數運算溢位都沒有偵測到 (處理適當的溢位，請參閱)。Overflow is not detected for integer operations (for proper overflow handling, see ). 整數減法包裝，而不是飽和。Integer subtraction wraps, rather than saturates. 例如： 假設 8 位元整數，其中`value1`設定為 0 和`value2`設為 1 時，「 包裝的 」 的結果會是 255。For example: assuming 8-bit integers, where `value1` is set to 0 and `value2` is set to 1, the "wrapped" result will be 255. 傳回浮點溢位`+inf`(`PositiveInfinity`) 或`-inf`(`NegativeInfinity`)。Floating-point overflow returns `+inf` (`PositiveInfinity`) or `-inf` (`NegativeInfinity`). 下列方法多載可以使用`sub`opcode:The following method overload can use the `sub` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Sub_Ovf As OpCode

summary.span: 將另一個值減去某一個值、執行溢位檢查，並將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Subtracts one integer value from another, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DADA|sub.ovfsub.ovf|一個整數值減去另一個具有溢位檢查。Subtracts one integer value from another with an overflow check.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value2`會減去`value1`具有溢位檢查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value2` is subtracted from `value1` with a check for overflow. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 帶正負號的整數; 上執行這項作業浮點數的值，使用。This operation is performed on signed integers; for floating-point values, use . 下列方法多載可以使用`sub.ovf`opcode:The following method overload can use the `sub.ovf` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

span.span: Subtracts one unsigned integer value from another, performs an overflow check, and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |DBDB|sub.ovf.unsub.ovf.un|一個不帶正負號的整數值減去另一個具有溢位檢查。Subtracts one unsigned integer value from another with an overflow check.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊;`value2`會減去`value1`具有溢位檢查。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack; `value2` is subtracted from `value1` with a check for overflow. 4. 結果會推送至堆疊。The result is pushed onto the stack. 如果結果無法表示的結果型別中，會擲回。 is thrown if the result can not be represented in the result type. 帶正負號的整數; 上執行這項作業浮點數的值，使用。This operation is performed on signed integers; for floating-point values, use . 下列方法多載可以使用`sub.ovf.un`opcode:The following method overload can use the `sub.ovf.un` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

summary.span: 實作跳躍表格。

span.span: Implements a jump table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |45 < `unsigned int32` >< `int32` >...< `int32` >45 < `unsigned int32` > < `int32` >... < `int32` >|切換 (`N`， `t1`， `t2`...`tN`)switch (`N`, `t1`, `t2`... `tN`)|跳至其中一個`N`值。Jumps to one of `N` values.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 的值會推入至堆疊。A value is pushed onto the stack. 2. 值從堆疊取出並將執行轉移至編製索引的值，位移指示其中的值是小於`N`。The value is popped off the stack and execution is transferred to the instruction at the offset indexed by the value, where the value is less than `N`. `switch`指令實作跳躍表格。The `switch` instruction implements a jump table. 指示的格式`unsigned int32`表示的目標數目`N`，後面接著`N`int32 值，指定跳躍目標。The format of the instruction is an `unsigned int32` representing the number of targets `N`, followed by `N` int32 values specifying jump targets. 這些目標時，會表示為位移 （正或負） 上，從一開始遵循此指示的`switch`指令。These targets are represented as offsets (positive or negative) from the beginning of the instruction following this `switch` instruction. `switch`指令從堆疊取出值，並比較其項目，做為不帶正負號的整數， `N`。The `switch` instruction pops a value off the stack and compares it, as an unsigned integer, to `N`. 如果值是小於`N`，執行會傳輸至目標值，編製索引從 0 開始編號的目標 （例如，值為 0 會採用第一個目標，1 的值會採用第二個目標，並依此類推）。If value is less than `N`, execution is transferred to the target indexed by value, where targets are numbered from 0 (for example, a value of 0 takes the first target, a value of 1 takes the second target, and so on). 如果值是大於或等於`N`，繼續執行下一個指令 （正常執行）。If the value is greater than or equal to `N`, execution continues at the next instruction (fall through). 如果目標指令具有一或多個前置詞程式碼，控制項只能傳送到第一個一個前置詞。If the target instruction has one or more prefix codes, control can only be transferred to the first of these prefixes. 控制傳入和傳出傳輸`try`， `catch`， `filter`，和`finally`區塊無法執行這項指示。Control transfers into and out of `try`, `catch`, `filter`, and `finally` blocks cannot be performed by this instruction. （這類傳輸嚴重限制而必須改用）。(Such transfers are severely restricted and must use the leave instruction instead). 下列方法多載可以使用`switch`opcode。The following method overload can use the `switch` opcode. `Label[]`引數是標籤代表 32 位元位移的陣列。The `Label[]` argument is an array of Labels representing 32-bit offsets. - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 Label[])ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label[]) ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`Switch`產生跳躍表使用陣列的 opcode 。The following code sample illustrates the use of the `Switch` opcode to generate a jump table using an array of . [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator.Emit Example 2/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Shared ReadOnly Tailcall As OpCode

summary.span: 執行後置的方法呼叫指令 (例如目前方法的堆疊框架) 會在執行實際的呼叫指令之前移除。

span.span: Performs a postfixed method call instruction such that the current method's stack frame is removed before the actual call instruction is executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 14FE 14|結尾。tail.|後續呼叫會終止目前的方法Subsequent call terminates current methods| 不沒有定義這個指示任何堆疊轉換行為。There is no stack transition behavior defined for this instruction. `tail`前置詞指令必須緊接著， ，或指令。The `tail` prefix instruction must immediately precede a , , or instruction. 指出呼叫指令執行之前，應該移除目前方法的堆疊框架。It indicates that the current method's stack frame should be removed before the call instruction is executed. 這也表示從下列呼叫傳回的值也是目前的方法所傳回的值，並因此可以跨方法跳到轉換呼叫。It also implies that the value returned from the following call is also the value returned by the current method, and the call can therefore be converted into a cross-method jump. 堆疊不得為空白，除了下列的呼叫所傳送的引數。The stack must be empty except for the arguments being transferred by the following call. 緊跟在呼叫指令必須是 ret。唯一有效的程式碼序列會因而`tail. call`(或`calli`或`callvirt`)。The instruction following the call instruction must be a ret. Thus the only valid code sequence is `tail. call` (or `calli` or `callvirt`). 正確的 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示不必須分支到`call`的指示，但它們可能會分支到後續。Correct Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions must not branch to the `call` instruction, but they may branch to the subsequent . 控制權會轉移不受信任的程式碼從信任的程式碼，因為這可能危及程式碼身分識別安全性時，就無法捨棄目前的框架。The current frame cannot be discarded when control is transferred from untrusted code to trusted code, since this would jeopardize code identity security. .NET Framework 安全性檢查，因此可能會造成`tail`遭到忽略，離開標準指令。The .NET Framework security checks can therefore cause the `tail` to be ignored, leaving a standard instruction. 同樣地，為了讓已同步處理的區域發生在呼叫傳回之後結束，則`tail`時用來結束標示為已同步處理的方法，會忽略前置詞。Similarly, in order to allow the exit of a synchronized region to occur after the call returns, the `tail` prefix is ignored when used to exit a method that is marked synchronized. 下列方法多載可以使用`tail`opcode:The following method overload can use the `tail` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool TakesSingleByteArgument(valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode inst) cil managed
Public Shared Function TakesSingleByteArgument (inst As OpCode) As Boolean

span.span: An instance of an Opcode object.

summary.span: 如果提供的作業碼採用單一位元組引數，則傳回 True 或 False。

span.span: Returns true or false if the supplied opcode takes a single byte argument.
or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來找出哪些 MSIL 作業碼 「 簡短表單 」，用於最佳化程式碼中使用。This method can be used to find which MSIL opcodes are "short form", for use in optimized code. `TakesSingleByteArgument` 會傳回`true`如果執行個體使用單一位元組引數，在下列情況：`TakesSingleByteArgument` returns `true` if the instance takes a single byte argument in the following cases: - Opcode 會執行分支指令的位元組大小的位址 (例如和)。The opcode performs a branch instruction to a byte-sized address (for example, and ). - Opcode 會推送至堆疊的位元組值 (例如)。The opcode pushes a byte value onto the stack (for example, ). - Opcode 參考變數或引數，透過的位元組大小 」 簡短形式 」 (例如和)。The opcode references a variable or argument via the byte-sized "short form" (for example, and ). 否則它會傳回 `false`。Otherwise, it returns `false`. 下列範例示範如何使用`TakesSingleByteArgument`入反映`OpCodes`類別和測試以查看是否每個`OpCode`欄位採用單一位元組引數。The example below demonstrates the use of `TakesSingleByteArgument` by reflecting on to the `OpCodes` class and testing to see whether each `OpCode` field takes a single-byte argument. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.OpCodes.TakesSingleByteArgument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 擲回目前位於評估堆疊的例外狀況物件。

span.span: Throws the exception object currently on the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |7A7A|throwthrow|擲回例外狀況。Throws an exception.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. （將例外狀況） 的物件參考推送至堆疊。An object reference (to an exception) is pushed onto the stack. 2. 物件參考會從堆疊並擲回的例外狀況中推出。The object reference is popped from the stack and the exception thrown. `throw`指令會擲回的例外狀況物件 (類型`O`) 目前在堆疊上。The `throw` instruction throws the exception object (type `O`) currently on the stack. 如果物件參考為 null 參考，會擲回。 is thrown if the object reference is a null reference. 下列方法多載可以使用`throw`opcode:The following method overload can use the `throw` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

Public Shared ReadOnly Unaligned As OpCode

summary.span: 表示目前位於評估堆疊頂端的位置可能未對齊緊接 、、、、、、 或 指令的正常大小。

span.span: Indicates that an address currently atop the evaluation stack might not be aligned to the natural size of the immediately following , , , , , , , or instruction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 12 < `unsigned int8` >FE 12 < `unsigned int8` >|未對齊。unaligned. `alignment`|表示後續指標指令可能未對齊。Indicates that the subsequent pointer instruction may be unaligned.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位址會推送至堆疊。An address is pushed onto the stack. `Unaligned` 指定的位址 (的 unmanaged 的指標， `native int`) 在堆疊上可能未對齊緊接的正常大小`ldind`， `stind`， `ldfld`， `stfld`， `ldobj`， `stobj`，`initblk`，或`cpblk`指令。`Unaligned` specifies that the address (an unmanaged pointer, `native int`) on the stack might not be aligned to the natural size of the immediately following `ldind`, `stind`, `ldfld`, `stfld`, `ldobj`, `stobj`, `initblk`, or `cpblk` instruction. 也就是針對指令位址的對齊方式可能無法與 4 位元組界限。That is, for a instruction the alignment of the address may not be to a 4-byte boundary. 針對`initblk`和`cpblk`預設對齊方式是架構相依 （4 個 32 位元 cpu，在 64 位元 Cpu 上的 8 個位元組的位元組）。For `initblk` and `cpblk` the default alignment is architecture dependent (4-byte on 32-bit CPUs, 8-byte on 64-bit CPUs). 未將其輸出限制為 32 位元字組大小的程式碼產生器必須使用`unaligned`如果對齊不在編譯時期已知為 8 個位元組。Code generators that do not restrict their output to a 32-bit word size must use `unaligned` if the alignment is not known at compile time to be 8-byte. 對齊的值必須是 1、 2 或 4 和產生的程式碼應該採用的位址是雙位元組的位元組，或分別 4 位元組對齊的方式。The value of alignment must be 1, 2, or 4 and means that the generated code should assume that the address is byte, double-byte, or quad-byte aligned, respectively. 請注意該暫時性指標 (型別`*`) 一律對齊。Note that transient pointers (type `*`) are always aligned. 雖然的對齊方式`cpblk`指令會以邏輯方式需要兩個數字 （一個為來源），另一個用於目的地，則不會嚴重影響效能如果只指定較低的數字。While the alignment for a `cpblk` instruction would logically require two numbers (one for the source and one for the destination), there is no noticeable impact on performance if only the lower number is specified. `unaligned`和`volatile`可以按照任何順序結合前置詞。The `unaligned` and `volatile` prefixes can be combined in either order. 後面必須緊接著`ldind`， `stind`， `ldfld`， `stfld`， `ldobj`， `stobj`， `initblk`，或`cpblk`指令。They must immediately precede a `ldind`, `stind`, `ldfld`, `stfld`, `ldobj`, `stobj`, `initblk`, or `cpblk` instruction. 只有允許前置詞和指示。Only the prefix is allowed for the and instructions. 下列方法多載可以使用`unaligned`opcode:The following method overloads can use the `unaligned` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 標籤）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Label) - ILGenerator.Emit （Opcode，Byte）ILGenerator.Emit(Opcode, Byte)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Unbox
Public Shared ReadOnly Unbox As OpCode

summary.span: 將實值類型的 boxed 表示轉換成它的 unboxed 形式。

span.span: Converts the boxed representation of a value type to its unboxed form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |79 < `T` >79 < `T` >|unbox `valType`unbox `valType`|擷取值的型別資料，從`obj`、 其表示法進行 boxed 處理。Extracts the value type data from `obj`, its boxed representation.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考推送至堆疊。An object reference is pushed onto the stack. 2. 物件參考是從堆疊推出和 unboxed 實值類型指標至。The object reference is popped from the stack and unboxed to a value type pointer. 3. 實值型別指標會推送至堆疊。The value type pointer is pushed onto the stack. 實值型別有兩種不同的表示法在 Common Language Infrastructure (CLI):A value type has two separate representations within the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI): - 當實值型別內嵌在另一個物件時，使用 'raw' 格式。A 'raw' form used when a value type is embedded within another object. - 'Boxed' 格式，其中實值型別中的資料會包裝 （進行 boxed 處理） 到物件讓它可以當作獨立的實體存在。A 'boxed' form, where the data in the value type is wrapped (boxed) into an object so it can exist as an independent entity. `unbox`指令會將轉換的物件參考 (型別`O`)、 boxed 的實值類型，表示值的類型指標 (managed 的指標，類型`&`)、 其 unboxed 形式。The `unbox` instruction converts the object reference (type `O`), the boxed representation of a value type, to a value type pointer (a managed pointer, type `&`), its unboxed form. 提供的實值型別 (`valType`) 為中繼資料語彙基元，表示類型的 boxed 物件內所包含的值型別。The supplied value type (`valType`) is a metadata token indicating the type of value type contained within the boxed object. 不同於，這必要項目在物件中，製作一份使用實值型別`unbox`不需要複製物件中的實值型別。Unlike , which is required to make a copy of a value type for use in the object, `unbox` is not required to copy the value type from the object. 通常它只會計算已存在的 boxed 物件內的值類型的位址。Typically it simply computes the address of the value type that is already present inside of the boxed object. 如果物件不化為會擲回`valType`。 is thrown if the object is not boxed as `valType`. 如果物件參考為 null 參考，會擲回。 is thrown if the object reference is a null reference. 如果型別值，會擲回`valType`找不到。 is thrown if the value type `valType` cannot be found. 這通常是偵測到 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 指示轉換至原生程式碼，而不是在執行階段時。This is typically detected when Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) instructions are converted to native code, rather than at runtime. 下列方法多載可以使用`unbox`opcode:The following method overload can use the `unbox` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Unbox_Any
Public Shared ReadOnly Unbox_Any As OpCode

summary.span: 將指令中指定之類型的 boxed 表示轉換成其 unboxed 形式。

span.span: Converts the boxed representation of a type specified in the instruction to its unboxed form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |A5 < `T` >A5 < `T` >|unbox.any `typeTok`unbox.any `typeTok`|擷取從資料`obj`、 其表示法進行 boxed 處理。Extract the data from `obj`, its boxed representation.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 物件參考`obj`推送至堆疊。An object reference `obj` is pushed onto the stack. 2. 物件參考是從堆疊推出和 unboxed 指令中指定的型別。The object reference is popped from the stack and unboxed to the type specified in the instruction. 3. 產生的物件參考或實值類型會推送至堆疊。The resulting object reference or value type is pushed onto the stack. 套用至 boxed 實值型別時`unbox.any`指令會擷取內含值`obj`(型別的`O`)，而因此相當於`unbox`後面`ldobj`。When applied to the boxed form of a value type, the `unbox.any` instruction extracts the value contained within `obj` (of type `O`), and is therefore equivalent to `unbox` followed by `ldobj`. 當套用至參考型別`unbox.any`指令具有相同的效果`castclass` `typeTok`。When applied to a reference type, the `unbox.any` instruction has the same effect as `castclass` `typeTok`. 如果運算元`typeTok`是泛型類型參數，則執行階段行為取決於該泛型型別參數指定的型別。If the operand `typeTok` is a generic type parameter, then the runtime behavior is determined by the type that is specified for that generic type parameter. 如果擲回`obj`不經過 boxing 處理的型別。 is thrown if `obj` is not a boxed type. 如果擲回`obj`為 null 參考。 is thrown if `obj` is a null reference. 下列方法多載可以使用`unbox.any`opcode:The following method overload can use the `unbox.any` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit （OpCode、 型別）ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode, Type)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Volatile
Public Shared ReadOnly Volatile As OpCode

summary.span: 指定目前在評估堆疊頂端的位址可能是 volatile，並且無法快取讀取該位置的結果，或者無法隱藏存放該位置的多個存放區。

span.span: Specifies that an address currently atop the evaluation stack might be volatile, and the results of reading that location cannot be cached or that multiple stores to that location cannot be suppressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |FE 13FE 13|變動性。volatile.|表示後續指標參考為 volatile。Indicates that the subsequent pointer reference is volatile.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. 位址會推送至堆疊。An address is pushed onto the stack. `volatile`.`volatile`. 指定的位址是動態位址 （也就是可以從外部參考目前的執行緒） 和讀取位置無法快取，或發現無法隱藏多個門市，至該位置的結果。specifies that the address is a volatile address (that is, it can be referenced externally to the current thread of execution) and the results of reading that location cannot be cached or that multiple stores to that location cannot be suppressed. 標示為存取`volatile`只有該單一存取; 會影響其他存取相同的位置必須分別標示。Marking an access as `volatile` affects only that single access; other accesses to the same location must be marked separately. 不需要以不可分割方式執行變動性的位置存取。Access to volatile locations need not be performed atomically. 和`volatile`可以按照任何順序結合前置詞。The and `volatile` prefixes can be combined in either order. 後面必須緊接著`ldind`， `stind`， `ldfld`， `stfld`， `ldobj`， `stobj`， `initblk`，或`cpblk`指令。They must immediately precede a `ldind`, `stind`, `ldfld`, `stfld`, `ldobj`, `stobj`, `initblk`, or `cpblk` instruction. 只有`volatile`允許前置詞和指示。Only the `volatile` prefix is allowed for the and instructions. 下列方法多載可以使用`volatile`opcode:The following method overload can use the `volatile` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode Xor
Public Shared ReadOnly Xor As OpCode

summary.span: 計算評估堆疊頂端兩個值的位元 XOR，將結果推送至評估堆疊。

span.span: Computes the bitwise XOR of the top two values on the evaluation stack, pushing the result onto the evaluation stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出的指示十六進位和 Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) 的組件格式，以及簡短的參考摘要：The following table lists the instruction's hexadecimal and Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) assembly format, along with a brief reference summary: |格式Format|組件格式Assembly Format|描述Description| |------------|---------------------|-----------------| |6161|xorxor|計算兩個整數值的位元 XOR 並傳回一個整數。Computes the bitwise XOR of two integer values and returns an integer.| 堆疊的轉換行為，依連續順序是：The stack transitional behavior, in sequential order, is: 1. `value1` 推送至堆疊。`value1` is pushed onto the stack. 2. `value2` 推送至堆疊。`value2` is pushed onto the stack. 3. `value2` 和`value1`會彈出從堆疊和其位元 XOR 計算。`value2` and `value1` are popped from the stack and their bitwise XOR computed. 4. 位元 XOR`value2`和`value1`推送至堆疊。The bitwise XOR of `value2` and `value1` is pushed onto the stack. `xor`指令會計算位元 XOR 的前兩個值在堆疊上，並將結果留在堆疊上。The `xor` instruction computes the bitwise XOR of the top two values on the stack and leaves the result on the stack. `Xor` 是整數特定作業。`Xor` is an integer-specific operation. 下列方法多載可以使用`xor`opcode:The following method overload can use the `xor` opcode: - ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)ILGenerator.Emit(OpCode)
